   20: %% Description: Tests supervisor.erl
   21: 
   22: -module(supervisor_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %% Testserver specific export
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2, init_per_testcase/2,
   29: 	 end_per_testcase/2]).
   30: 
   31: %% Internal export
   32: -export([init/1, terminate_all_children/1,
   33:          middle9212/0, gen_server9212/0, handle_info/2, start_registered_name/1, log/2]).
   34: 
   35: %% API tests
   36: -export([ sup_start_normal/1, sup_start_ignore_init/1, 
   37: 	  sup_start_ignore_child/1, sup_start_ignore_temporary_child/1,
   38: 	  sup_start_ignore_temporary_child_start_child/1,
   39: 	  sup_start_ignore_temporary_child_start_child_simple/1,
   40:           sup_start_ignore_permanent_child_start_child_simple/1,
   41: 	  sup_start_error_return/1, sup_start_fail/1,
   42:           sup_start_child_returns_error/1,
   43:           sup_start_restart_child_returns_error/1,
   44:           sup_start_child_returns_error_simple/1,
   45: 	  sup_start_map/1, sup_start_map_simple/1,
   46: 	  sup_start_map_faulty_specs/1,
   47: 	  sup_stop_infinity/1, sup_stop_timeout/1, sup_stop_timeout_dynamic/1,
   48: 	  sup_stop_brutal_kill/1, sup_stop_brutal_kill_dynamic/1,
   49:           sup_stop_race/1, sup_stop_non_shutdown_exit_dynamic/1,
   50: 	  child_adm/1, child_adm_simple/1, child_specs/1, child_specs_map/1,
   51: 	  extra_return/1, sup_flags/1]).
   52: 
   53: %% Tests concept permanent, transient and temporary 
   54: -export([external_start_no_progress_log/1, 
   55:          permanent_normal/1, transient_normal/1, temporary_normal/1,
   56:          permanent_shutdown/1, transient_shutdown/1, temporary_shutdown/1,
   57:          faulty_application_shutdown/1,
   58:          permanent_abnormal/1, transient_abnormal/1,
   59:          temporary_abnormal/1, temporary_bystander/1]).
   60: 
   61: %% Restart strategy tests 
   62: -export([ multiple_restarts/1,
   63: 	  one_for_one/1,
   64: 	  one_for_one_escalation/1, one_for_all/1,
   65: 	  one_for_all_escalation/1, one_for_all_other_child_fails_restart/1,
   66: 	  simple_one_for_one/1, simple_one_for_one_escalation/1,
   67:           simple_one_for_one_corruption/1,
   68: 	  rest_for_one/1, rest_for_one_escalation/1,
   69: 	  rest_for_one_other_child_fails_restart/1,
   70: 	  simple_one_for_one_extra/1, simple_one_for_one_shutdown/1,
   71:           simple_one_for_one_restart_ignore/1]).
   72: 
   73: %% Significant child tests
   74: -export([ nonsignificant_temporary/1, nonsignificant_transient/1,
   75: 	  significant_temporary/1, significant_transient/1,
   76: 	  significant_simple/1, significant_bystander/1,
   77: 	  significant_escalation/1, significant_upgrade_never_any/1,
   78: 	  significant_upgrade_any_never/1, significant_upgrade_never_all/1,
   79: 	  significant_upgrade_all_never/1, significant_upgrade_any_all/1,
   80: 	  significant_upgrade_all_any/1, significant_upgrade_child/1]).
   81: 
   82: %% Misc tests
   83: -export([child_unlink/1, tree/1, count_children/1, count_children_supervisor/1,
   84: 	 count_restarting_children/1, get_callback_module/1,
   85: 	 do_not_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children/1,
   86: 	 do_not_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children/1,
   87: 	 simple_one_for_one_scale_many_temporary_children/1,
   88:          simple_global_supervisor/1, hanging_restart_loop/1,
   89: 	 hanging_restart_loop_rest_for_one/1,
   90: 	 hanging_restart_loop_simple/1, code_change/1, code_change_map/1,
   91: 	 code_change_simple/1, code_change_simple_map/1,
   92:          order_of_children/1, scale_start_stop_many_children/1,
   93:          format_log_1/1, format_log_2/1, already_started_outside_supervisor/1]).
   94: 
   95: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
   96: 
   97: suite() ->
   98:     [%{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   99:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
  100: 
  101: all() -> 
  102:     [{group, sup_start}, {group, sup_start_map}, {group, sup_stop}, child_adm,
  103:      child_adm_simple, extra_return, child_specs, child_specs_map, sup_flags,
  104:      multiple_restarts,
  105:      {group, restart_one_for_one},
  106:      {group, restart_one_for_all},
  107:      {group, restart_simple_one_for_one},
  108:      {group, restart_rest_for_one},
  109:      {group, normal_termination},
  110:      {group, shutdown_termination},
  111:      {group, abnormal_termination}, child_unlink, tree,
  112:      {group, significant},
  113:      count_children, count_children_supervisor, count_restarting_children,
  114:      get_callback_module,
  115:      do_not_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children,
  116:      do_not_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children,
  117:      simple_one_for_one_scale_many_temporary_children, temporary_bystander,
  118:      simple_global_supervisor, hanging_restart_loop,
  119:      hanging_restart_loop_rest_for_one, hanging_restart_loop_simple,
  120:      code_change, code_change_map, code_change_simple, code_change_simple_map,
  121:      order_of_children, scale_start_stop_many_children,
  122:      format_log_1, format_log_2, already_started_outside_supervisor].
  123: 
  124: groups() -> 
  125:     [{sup_start, [],
  126:       [sup_start_normal, sup_start_ignore_init,
  127:        sup_start_ignore_child, sup_start_ignore_temporary_child,
  128:        sup_start_ignore_temporary_child_start_child,
  129:        sup_start_ignore_temporary_child_start_child_simple,
  130:        sup_start_ignore_permanent_child_start_child_simple,
  131:        sup_start_error_return, sup_start_fail,
  132:        sup_start_child_returns_error, sup_start_restart_child_returns_error,
  133:        sup_start_child_returns_error_simple
  134:       ]},
  135:      {sup_start_map, [],
  136:       [sup_start_map, sup_start_map_simple, sup_start_map_faulty_specs]},
  137:      {sup_stop, [],
  138:       [sup_stop_infinity, sup_stop_timeout, sup_stop_timeout_dynamic,
  139:        sup_stop_brutal_kill, sup_stop_brutal_kill_dynamic,
  140:        sup_stop_race, sup_stop_non_shutdown_exit_dynamic]},
  141:      {normal_termination, [],
  142:       [external_start_no_progress_log, permanent_normal, transient_normal, temporary_normal]},
  143:      {shutdown_termination, [],
  144:       [permanent_shutdown, transient_shutdown, temporary_shutdown,
  145:        faulty_application_shutdown]},
  146:      {abnormal_termination, [],
  147:       [permanent_abnormal, transient_abnormal,
  148:        temporary_abnormal]},
  149:      {restart_one_for_one, [],
  150:       [one_for_one, one_for_one_escalation]},
  151:      {restart_one_for_all, [],
  152:       [one_for_all, one_for_all_escalation,
  153:        one_for_all_other_child_fails_restart]},
  154:      {restart_simple_one_for_one, [],
  155:       [simple_one_for_one, simple_one_for_one_shutdown,
  156:        simple_one_for_one_extra, simple_one_for_one_escalation,
  157:        simple_one_for_one_corruption, simple_one_for_one_restart_ignore]},
  158:      {restart_rest_for_one, [],
  159:       [rest_for_one, rest_for_one_escalation,
  160:        rest_for_one_other_child_fails_restart]},
  161:      {significant, [],
  162:       [nonsignificant_temporary, nonsignificant_transient,
  163:        significant_temporary, significant_transient,
  164:        significant_simple, significant_bystander,
  165:        significant_escalation,
  166:        significant_upgrade_never_any, significant_upgrade_any_never,
  167:        significant_upgrade_never_all, significant_upgrade_all_never,
  168:        significant_upgrade_any_all, significant_upgrade_all_any,
  169:        significant_upgrade_child]}].
  170: 
  171: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  172:     Config.
  173: 
  174: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  175:     ok.
  176: 
  177: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  178:     Config.
  179: 
  180: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  181:     Config.
  182: 
  183: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  184:     Config.
  185: 
  186: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
  187:     %% Clean up to avoid unnecessary error reports in the shell
  188:     case whereis(sup_test) of
  189:         SupPid when is_pid(SupPid) ->
  190:             unlink(SupPid),
  191:             exit(SupPid,shutdown),
  192:             ok;
  193:         _ ->
  194:             error
  195:     end,
  196:     ok.
  197: 
  198: start_link(InitResult) ->
  199:     supervisor:start_link({local, sup_test}, ?MODULE, InitResult).
  200: 
  201: %% Simulate different supervisors callback.  
  202: init(fail) ->
  203:     erlang:error(fail);
  204: init(InitResult) ->
  205:     InitResult.
  206: 
  207: %% Respect proplist return of supervisor:count_children
  208: get_child_counts(Supervisor) ->
  209:     Counts = supervisor:count_children(Supervisor),
  210:     [proplists:get_value(specs, Counts),
  211:      proplists:get_value(active, Counts),
  212:      proplists:get_value(supervisors, Counts),
  213:      proplists:get_value(workers, Counts)].
  214: 
  215: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  216: %% Test cases starts here.
  217: %% -------------------------------------------------------------------------
  218: %% Tests that the supervisor process starts correctly and that it can
  219: %% be terminated gracefully.
  220: sup_start_normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  221:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  222:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  223:     terminate(Pid, shutdown).
  224: 
  225: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  226: %% Tests what happens if init-callback returns ignore.
  227: sup_start_ignore_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  228:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  229:     ignore = start_link(ignore),
  230:     check_no_exit(100).
  231: 
  232: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  233: %% Tests what happens if init-callback returns ignore.
  234: sup_start_ignore_child(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  235:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  236:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  237:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [ignore]}, 
  238: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  239:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
  240: 	      1000, worker, []},
  241: 
  242:     {ok, undefined} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
  243:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
  244: 
  245:     [{child2, CPid2, worker, []},{child1, undefined, worker, []}]
  246: 	= supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  247:     [2,1,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
  248: 
  249: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  250: %% Tests what happens if child's init-callback returns ignore for a
  251: %% temporary child when ChildSpec is returned directly from supervisor
  252: %% init callback.
  253: %% Child spec shall NOT be saved!!!
  254: sup_start_ignore_temporary_child(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  255:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  256:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [ignore]},
  257: 	      temporary, 1000, worker, []},
  258:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary,
  259: 	      1000, worker, []},
  260:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child1,Child2]}}),
  261: 
  262:     [{child2, CPid2, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  263:     true = is_pid(CPid2),
  264:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
  265: 
  266: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  267: %% Tests what happens if child's init-callback returns ignore for a
  268: %% temporary child when child is started with start_child/2.
  269: %% Child spec shall NOT be saved!!!
  270: sup_start_ignore_temporary_child_start_child(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  271:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  272:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  273:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [ignore]},
  274: 	      temporary, 1000, worker, []},
  275:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary,
  276: 	      1000, worker, []},
  277: 
  278:     {ok, undefined} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
  279:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
  280: 
  281:     [{child2, CPid2, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  282:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
  283: 
  284: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  285: %% Tests what happens if child's init-callback returns ignore for a
  286: %% temporary child when child is started with start_child/2, and the
  287: %% supervisor is simple_one_for_one.
  288: %% Child spec shall NOT be saved!!!
  289: sup_start_ignore_temporary_child_start_child_simple(Config)
  290:   when is_list(Config) ->
  291:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  292:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [ignore]},
  293: 	      temporary, 1000, worker, []},
  294:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child1]}}),
  295: 
  296:     {ok, undefined} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
  297:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
  298: 
  299:     [{undefined, CPid2, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  300:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
  301: 
  302: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  303: %% Tests what happens if child's init-callback returns ignore for a
  304: %% permanent child when child is started with start_child/2, and the
  305: %% supervisor is simple_one_for_one.
  306: %% Child spec shall NOT be saved!!!
  307: sup_start_ignore_permanent_child_start_child_simple(Config)
  308:   when is_list(Config) ->
  309:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  310:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [ignore]},
  311: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  312:     {ok, Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child1]}}),
  313: 
  314:     {ok, undefined} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
  315:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
  316: 
  317:     [{undefined, CPid2, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  318:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  319: 
  320:     %% Regression test: check that the supervisor terminates without error.
  321:     exit(Pid, shutdown),
  322:     check_exit_reason(Pid, shutdown).
  323: 
  324: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  325: %% Tests what happens if init-callback returns a invalid value.
  326: sup_start_error_return(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  327:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  328:     %% The bad return is processed in supervisor:init/1
  329:     InitResult = invalid,
  330:     {error, {bad_return, {?MODULE, init, InitResult}}} =
  331:         start_link(InitResult),
  332:     check_no_exit(100).
  333: 
  334: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  335: %% Tests what happens if init-callback fails.
  336: sup_start_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  337:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  338:     %% The exception is processed in gen_server:init_it/2
  339:     ErrorReason = fail,
  340:     {error, {ErrorReason, _Stacktrace}} = start_link(ErrorReason),
  341:     check_no_exit(100).
  342: 
  343: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  344: %% Test what happens when the start function for a child returns
  345: %% {error,Reason} or some other term().
  346: sup_start_restart_child_returns_error(_Config) ->
  347:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  348:     Child = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [error]},
  349:               permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  350:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  351: 
  352:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  353:     {error,{function_clause,_}} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test,child1),
  354: 
  355:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  356:     ok.
  357: 
  358: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  359: %% Test what happens when the start function for a child returns
  360: %% {error,Reason} or some other term().
  361: sup_start_child_returns_error(_Config) ->
  362:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  363:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [{return,{error,reason}}]},
  364:               permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  365:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, [{return,error_reason}]},
  366:               permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  367:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  368: 
  369:     {error,{reason,_}} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test,Child1),
  370:     {error,{error_reason,_}} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test,Child2),
  371: 
  372:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  373:     ok.
  374: 
  375: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  376: %% Test what happens when the start function for a child returns
  377: %% {error,Reason} - simple_one_for_one
  378: sup_start_child_returns_error_simple(_Config) ->
  379:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  380:     Child = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
  381:              permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  382:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  383: 
  384:     {error,reason} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test,[{return,{error,reason}}]),
  385:     {error,error_reason} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test,[{return,error_reason}]),
  386: 
  387:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  388:     ok.
  389: 
  390: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  391: %% Tests that the supervisor process starts correctly with map
  392: %% startspec, and that the full childspec can be read.
  393: sup_start_map(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  394:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  395:     Child1 = #{id=>child1, start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
  396:     Child2 = #{id=>child2,
  397: 	       start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
  398: 	       shutdown=>brutal_kill},
  399:     Child3 = #{id=>child3,
  400: 	       start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
  401: 	       type=>supervisor},
  402:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {#{}, [Child1,Child2,Child3]}}),
  403: 
  404:     %% Check default values
  405:     {ok,#{id:=child1,
  406: 	  start:={supervisor_1,start_child,[]},
  407: 	  restart:=permanent,
  408: 	  shutdown:=5000,
  409: 	  type:=worker,
  410: 	  modules:=[supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, child1),
  411:     {ok,#{id:=child2,
  412: 	  start:={supervisor_1,start_child,[]},
  413: 	  restart:=permanent,
  414: 	  shutdown:=brutal_kill,
  415: 	  type:=worker,
  416: 	  modules:=[supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, child2),
  417:     {ok,#{id:=child3,
  418: 	  start:={supervisor_1,start_child,[]},
  419: 	  restart:=permanent,
  420: 	  shutdown:=infinity,
  421: 	  type:=supervisor,
  422: 	  modules:=[supervisor_1]}} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, child3),
  423:     {error,not_found} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, child4),
  424:     terminate(Pid, shutdown).
  425: 
  426: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  427: %% Tests that the supervisor process starts correctly with map
  428: %% startspec, and that the full childspec can be read when using
  429: %% simple_one_for_one strategy.
  430: sup_start_map_simple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  431:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  432:     SupFlags = #{strategy=>simple_one_for_one},
  433:     ChildSpec = #{id=>undefined,
  434: 		  start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
  435: 		  restart=>temporary},
  436:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {SupFlags, [ChildSpec]}}),
  437: 
  438:     {ok, Child1} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, []),
  439:     {ok, Child2} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, []),
  440:     {ok, Child3} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, []),
  441: 
  442:     Spec = ChildSpec#{type=>worker, shutdown=>5000, modules=>[supervisor_1],
  443: 		      significant=>false},
  444: 
  445:     {ok, Spec} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, Child1),
  446:     {ok, Spec} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, Child2),
  447:     {ok, Spec} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, Child3),
  448:     {error,not_found} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid, self()),
  449:     terminate(Pid, shutdown).
  450: 
  451: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  452: %% Tests that the supervisor produces good error messages when start-
  453: %% and child specs are faulty.
  454: sup_start_map_faulty_specs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  455:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  456:     Child1 = #{start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
  457:     Child2 = #{id=>child2},
  458:     Child3 = #{id=>child3,
  459: 	       start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
  460: 	       silly_flag=>true},
  461:     Child4 = child4,
  462:     {error,{start_spec,missing_id}} = start_link({ok, {#{}, [Child1]}}),
  463:     {error,{start_spec,missing_start}} = start_link({ok, {#{}, [Child2]}}),
  464:     {ok,Pid} = start_link({ok, {#{}, [Child3]}}),
  465:     terminate(Pid,shutdown),
  466:     {error,{start_spec,{invalid_child_spec,child4}}} =
  467: 	start_link({ok, {#{}, [Child4]}}).
  468: 
  469: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  470: %% See sup_stop/1 when Shutdown = infinity, this walue is allowed for
  471: %% children of type supervisor _AND_ worker.
  472: sup_stop_infinity(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  473:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  474:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  475:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, 
  476: 	      permanent, infinity, supervisor, []},
  477:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
  478: 	      infinity, worker, []},
  479:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
  480:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
  481:     link(CPid1),
  482:     link(CPid2),
  483: 
  484:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  485:     check_exit_reason(CPid1, shutdown),
  486:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, shutdown).
  487: 
  488: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  489: %% See sup_stop/1 when Shutdown = 1000
  490: sup_stop_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  491:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  492:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  493:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, 
  494: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  495:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
  496: 	      1000, worker, []},
  497:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
  498:     link(CPid1),
  499:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
  500:     link(CPid2),
  501: 
  502:     CPid2 ! {sleep, 200000},
  503: 
  504:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  505: 
  506:     check_exit_reason(CPid1, shutdown),
  507:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, killed).
  508: 
  509: sup_stop_timeout_dynamic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  510:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  511:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000, worker, []},
  512:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  513:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, []),
  514:     link(CPid1),
  515:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, []),
  516:     link(CPid2),
  517:     CPid2 ! {sleep, 200000},
  518:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  519:     check_exit_reason(Pid, shutdown),
  520:     check_exit_reason(CPid1, shutdown),
  521:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, killed).
  522: 
  523: 
  524: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  525: %% See sup_stop/1 when Shutdown = brutal_kill
  526: sup_stop_brutal_kill(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  527:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  528:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  529:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, 
  530: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  531:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
  532: 	      brutal_kill, worker, []},
  533:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
  534:     link(CPid1),
  535:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
  536:     link(CPid2),
  537: 
  538:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  539: 
  540:     check_exit_reason(CPid1, shutdown),
  541:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, killed).
  542: 
  543: sup_stop_brutal_kill_dynamic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  544:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  545:     Child = {child, {supervisor_4, start_child, []}, temporary, brutal_kill, worker, []},
  546:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  547:     CPids = lists:map(
  548:         fun (_) ->
  549:             {ok, CPid} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, []),
  550:             link(CPid),
  551:             CPid
  552:         end,
  553:         lists:seq(1, 10)),
  554:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  555:     check_exit_reason(Pid, shutdown),
  556:     lists:foreach(
  557:         fun (CPid) ->
  558:             check_exit_reason(CPid, killed)
  559:         end,
  560:         CPids
  561:     ).
  562: 
  563: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  564: %% Tests that a supervisor completes its shutdown properly while children
  565: %% exit by themselves for reasons other than shutdown
  566: sup_stop_race(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  567:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  568:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  569:     {ok, CPidA} = supervisor:start_child(Pid,
  570:         #{id => child_a,
  571:           start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
  572:           restart => temporary,
  573:           shutdown => 1000}),
  574:     link(CPidA),
  575:     CPids = lists:foldl(
  576:         fun ({Restart, Reason}, Acc) ->
  577:             {ok, CPid} = supervisor:start_child(Pid,
  578:                 #{id => {child, make_ref()},
  579:                   start => {supervisor_4, start_child, [Reason]},
  580:                   restart => Restart,
  581:                   shutdown => 1000
  582:                 }),
  583:             link(CPid),
  584:             Acc#{CPid => Reason}
  585:         end,
  586:         #{},
  587:         [
  588:             {Restart, Reason}
  589:             || Restart <- [temporary, transient, permanent],
  590:                Reason <- [normal, shutdown, {shutdown, test}, other]
  591:         ]
  592:     ),
  593:     {ok, CPidZ} = supervisor:start_child(Pid,
  594:         #{
  595:             id => child_z,
  596:             start => {supervisor_2, start_child, [1000]},
  597:             restart => temporary,
  598:             shutdown => 2000
  599:         }),
  600:     link(CPidZ),
  601:     Self = self(),
  602:     spawn_link(
  603:         fun () ->
  604:             timer:sleep(200),
  605:             maps:foreach(
  606:                 fun (CPid, _) ->
  607:                     CPid ! stop
  608:                 end,
  609:                 CPids
  610:             ),
  611:             unlink(Self)
  612:         end
  613:     ),
  614:     ok = terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  615:     check_exit_reason(Pid, shutdown),
  616:     check_exit_reason(CPidZ, shutdown),
  617:     maps:foreach(
  618:         fun (CPid, Reason) ->
  619:             check_exit_reason(CPid, Reason)
  620:         end,
  621:         CPids),
  622:     check_exit_reason(CPidA, shutdown).
  623: 
  624: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  625: %% Tests that a simple_one_for_one supervisor shuts down correctly when
  626: %% some children exit with a reason other than shutdown
  627: sup_stop_non_shutdown_exit_dynamic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  628:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  629:     lists:foreach(
  630:         fun (Restart) ->
  631:             Child = {child, {supervisor_4, start_child, []}, Restart, 5000, worker, []},
  632:             {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  633:             CPids = lists:foldl(
  634:                 fun (Reason, Acc) ->
  635:                     {ok, CPid} = supervisor:start_child(Pid, [Reason]),
  636:                     link(CPid),
  637:                     Acc#{CPid => Reason}
  638:                 end,
  639:                 #{},
  640:                 [normal, shutdown, {shutdown, test}, other]
  641:             ),
  642:             ok = terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  643:             check_exit_reason(Pid, shutdown),
  644:             maps:foreach(
  645:                 fun (CPid, Reason) ->
  646:                     check_exit_reason(CPid, Reason)
  647:                 end,
  648:                 CPids)
  649:         end,
  650:         [temporary, transient, permanent]
  651:     ).
  652: 
  653: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  654: %% The start function provided to start a child may return {ok, Pid}
  655: %% or {ok, Pid, Info}, if it returns the latter check that the
  656: %% supervisor ignores the Info, and includes it unchanged in return
  657: %% from start_child/2 and restart_child/2.
  658: extra_return(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  659:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  660:     Child = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [extra_return]}, 
  661: 	     permanent, 1000,
  662: 	     worker, []},
  663:     {ok, _Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  664:     [{child1, CPid, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  665:     link(CPid),
  666:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, hej),
  667:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, hej),
  668:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, hej),
  669:     {error, running} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
  670:     {error, running} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  671:     [{child1, CPid, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  672:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  673: 
  674:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  675:     check_exit_reason(CPid, shutdown),
  676:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  677:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  678: 
  679:     {ok, CPid2,extra_return} =
  680: 	supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  681:     [{child1, CPid2, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  682:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  683: 
  684:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  685:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  686:     ok = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
  687:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  688:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  689:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  690: 
  691:     {ok, CPid3, extra_return} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child),
  692:     [{child1, CPid3, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  693:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  694: 
  695:     %% Check that it can be automatically restarted
  696:     terminate(CPid3, abnormal),
  697:     [{child1, CPid4, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  698:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  699:     if (not is_pid(CPid4)) orelse CPid4=:=CPid3 ->
  700:             ct:fail({not_restarted,CPid3,CPid4});
  701:        true ->
  702:             ok
  703:     end.
  704: 
  705: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  706: %% Test API functions start_child/2, terminate_child/2, delete_child/2
  707: %% restart_child/2, which_children/1, count_children/1. Only correct
  708: %% childspecs are used, handling of incorrect childspecs is tested in
  709: %% child_specs/1.
  710: child_adm(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  711:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  712:     Child = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
  713: 	     worker, []},
  714:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  715: 
  716:     %% Test that supervisors of static nature are hibernated after start
  717:     {current_function, {erlang, hibernate, 3}} =
  718: 	process_info(Pid, current_function),
  719: 
  720:     [{child1, CPid, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  721:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  722:     link(CPid),
  723:     %% Start of an already runnig process 
  724:     {error,{already_started, CPid}} =
  725: 	supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child),
  726: 
  727:     %% Termination
  728:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, hej),
  729:     {'EXIT',{noproc,{gen_server,call, _}}} =
  730: 	(catch supervisor:terminate_child(foo, child1)),
  731:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  732:     check_exit_reason(CPid, shutdown),
  733:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  734:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  735:     %% Like deleting something that does not exist, it will succeed!
  736:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  737: 
  738:     %% Start of already existing but not running process 
  739:     {error,already_present} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child),
  740: 
  741:     %% Restart
  742:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  743:     [{child1, CPid2, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  744:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  745:     {error, running} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  746:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child2),
  747: 
  748:     %% Deletion
  749:     {error, running} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
  750:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, hej),
  751:     {'EXIT',{noproc,{gen_server,call, _}}} =
  752: 	(catch supervisor:delete_child(foo, child1)),
  753:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  754:     ok = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
  755:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  756:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  757:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  758: 
  759:     %% Start
  760:     {'EXIT',{noproc,{gen_server,call, _}}} =
  761: 	(catch supervisor:start_child(foo, Child)),
  762:     {ok, CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child),
  763:     [{child1, CPid3, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  764:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  765: 
  766:     %% Terminate with Pid not allowed when not simple_one_for_one
  767:     {error,not_found} = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, CPid3),
  768:     [{child1, CPid3, worker, []}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  769:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  770: 
  771:     {'EXIT',{noproc,{gen_server,call,[foo,which_children,infinity]}}}
  772: 	= (catch supervisor:which_children(foo)),
  773:     {'EXIT',{noproc,{gen_server,call,[foo,count_children,infinity]}}}
  774: 	= (catch supervisor:count_children(foo)),
  775:     ok.
  776: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  777: %% The API functions terminate_child/2, delete_child/2 restart_child/2
  778: %% are not valid for a simple_one_for_one supervisor check that the
  779: %% correct error message is returned.
  780: child_adm_simple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  781:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
  782: 	     worker, []},
  783:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
  784: 
  785:        %% Test that supervisors of dynamic nature are not hibernated after start
  786:     {current_function, {_, Function, _}} =
  787: 	process_info(Pid, current_function),
  788:     true = Function =/= hibernate,
  789: 
  790:     %% In simple_one_for_one all children are added dynamically 
  791:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  792:     [1,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  793: 
  794:     %% Start
  795:     {'EXIT',{noproc,{gen_server,call, _}}} =
  796: 	(catch supervisor:start_child(foo, [])),
  797:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
  798:     [{undefined, CPid1, worker, []}] =
  799: 	supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  800:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  801: 
  802:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
  803:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  804:     2 = length(Children),
  805:     true = lists:member({undefined, CPid2, worker, []}, Children),
  806:     true = lists:member({undefined, CPid1, worker, []}, Children),
  807:     [1,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  808: 
  809:     %% Termination
  810:     {error, simple_one_for_one} = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
  811:     [1,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  812:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test,CPid1),
  813:     [_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  814:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  815:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(CPid1),
  816:     %% Terminate non-existing proccess is ok
  817:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test,CPid1),
  818:     [_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
  819:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
  820:     %% Terminate pid which is not a child of this supervisor is not ok
  821:     NoChildPid = spawn_link(fun() -> receive after infinity -> ok end end),
  822:     {error, not_found} = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, NoChildPid),
  823:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(NoChildPid),
  824: 
  825:     %% Restart
  826:     {error, simple_one_for_one} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
  827: 
  828:     %% Deletion
  829:     {error, simple_one_for_one} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
  830:     ok.
  831: 
  832: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  833: %% Tests child specs (tuple form), invalid formats should be rejected.
  834: child_specs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  835:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  836:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  837:     {error, _} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, hej),
  838: 
  839:     %% Bad child specs 
  840:     B1 = {child, mfa, permanent, 1000, worker, []},
  841:     B2 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, prmanent, 1000, worker, []}, 
  842:     B3 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, permanent, -10, worker, []},
  843:     B4 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, permanent, 10, wrker, []},
  844:     B5 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, permanent, 1000, worker, dy},
  845:     B6 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, permanent, 1000, worker, [1,2,3]},
  846: 
  847:     {error, {invalid_mfa,mfa}} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B1),
  848:     {error, {invalid_restart_type, prmanent}} =
  849: 	supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B2),
  850:     {error,  {invalid_shutdown,-10}}
  851: 	= supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B3),
  852:     {error, {invalid_child_type,wrker}}
  853: 	= supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B4),
  854:     {error, {invalid_modules,dy}}
  855: 	= supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B5),
  856: 
  857:     {error, {badarg, _}} = supervisor:check_childspecs(B1), % should be list
  858:     {error, {invalid_mfa,mfa}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B1]),
  859:     {error, {invalid_restart_type,prmanent}} =
  860: 	supervisor:check_childspecs([B2]),
  861:     {error, {invalid_shutdown,-10}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B3]),
  862:     {error, {invalid_child_type,wrker}}
  863: 	= supervisor:check_childspecs([B4]),
  864:     {error, {invalid_modules,dy}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B5]),
  865:     {error, {invalid_module, 1}} =
  866: 	supervisor:check_childspecs([B6]),
  867: 
  868:     lists:foreach(
  869: 	fun (ChildSpec) ->
  870: 	    ok = supervisor:check_childspecs([ChildSpec])
  871: 	end,
  872: 	[
  873: 	    {child, {m, f, [a]}, Restart, Shutdown, Type, Modules}
  874: 	    ||
  875: 		Restart <- [permanent, transient, temporary],
  876: 		Shutdown <- [0, 1000, infinity, brutal_kill],
  877: 		Type <- [supervisor, worker],
  878: 		Modules <- [dynamic, [], [m], [m1, m2]]
  879: 	]
  880:     ),
  881: 
  882:     C1 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, permanent, infinity, supervisor, []},
  883:     C2 = {child, {m,f,[a]}, permanent, 1000, supervisor, []},
  884: 
  885:     {error,{duplicate_child_name,child}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([C1,C2]),
  886: 
  887:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  888: 
  889:     %% Faulty child specs in supervisor start
  890:     {error, {start_spec, {invalid_mfa, mfa}}} =
  891: 	 start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [B1]}}),
  892:     {error, {start_spec, {invalid_restart_type, prmanent}}} =
  893: 	start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [B2]}}),
  894: 
  895:     %% simple_one_for_one needs exactly one child
  896:     {error,{bad_start_spec,[]}} =
  897: 	start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
  898:     {error,{bad_start_spec,[C1,C2]}} =
  899: 	start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [C1,C2]}}),
  900: 
  901:     ok.
  902: 
  903: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  904: %% Tests child specs (map form), invalid formats should be rejected.
  905: child_specs_map(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  906:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  907:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {#{}, []}}),
  908:     {error, _} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, hej),
  909: 
  910:     CS0 = #{id => child, start => {m, f, [a]}},
  911: 
  912:     %% Bad child specs 
  913:     B1 = #{},
  914:     B2 = #{id => child},
  915:     B3 = #{start => {m, f, [a]}},
  916:     B4 = CS0#{start => mfa},
  917:     B5 = CS0#{restart => prmanent}, 
  918:     B6 = CS0#{shutdown => -10},
  919:     B7 = CS0#{type => wrker},
  920:     B8 = CS0#{modules => dy},
  921:     B9 = CS0#{modules => [1,2,3]},
  922:     B10 = CS0#{significant => 'maybe'},
  923: 
  924:     {error, missing_id} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B1),
  925:     {error, missing_start} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B2),
  926:     {error, missing_id} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B3),
  927:     {error, {invalid_mfa,mfa}} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B4),
  928:     {error, {invalid_restart_type, prmanent}} =
  929: 	supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B5),
  930:     {error,  {invalid_shutdown,-10}}
  931: 	= supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B6),
  932:     {error, {invalid_child_type,wrker}}
  933: 	= supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B7),
  934:     {error, {invalid_modules,dy}}
  935: 	= supervisor:start_child(sup_test, B8),
  936: 
  937:     {error, {badarg, _}} = supervisor:check_childspecs(B1), % should be list
  938:     {error, missing_id} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B1]),
  939:     {error, missing_start} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B2]),
  940:     {error, missing_id} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B3]),
  941:     {error, {invalid_mfa,mfa}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B4]),
  942:     {error, {invalid_restart_type,prmanent}} =
  943: 	supervisor:check_childspecs([B5]),
  944:     {error, {invalid_shutdown,-10}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B6]),
  945:     {error, {invalid_child_type,wrker}}
  946: 	= supervisor:check_childspecs([B7]),
  947:     {error, {invalid_modules,dy}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([B8]),
  948:     {error, {invalid_module, 1}} =
  949: 	supervisor:check_childspecs([B9]),
  950:     {error, {invalid_significant, 'maybe'}} =
  951: 	supervisor:check_childspecs([B10]),
  952: 
  953:     CSFilter = fun (CS) -> maps:filter(fun (_, V) -> V =/= undefined end, CS) end,
  954:     lists:foreach(
  955: 	fun
  956: 	    ({never, ChildSpec = #{significant := true}}) ->
  957: 		ChildSpec1 = CSFilter(ChildSpec),
  958: 		{error, {bad_combination, BadOpts}} =
  959: 		    supervisor:check_childspecs([ChildSpec1], never),
  960: 		[{auto_shutdown, never}, {significant, true}] = lists:sort(BadOpts);
  961: 	    ({AutoShutdown, ChildSpec = #{restart := undefined, significant := true}}) ->
  962: 		ChildSpec1 = CSFilter(ChildSpec),
  963: 		{error, {bad_combination, BadOpts}} =
  964: 		    supervisor:check_childspecs([ChildSpec1], AutoShutdown),
  965: 		[{restart, permanent}, {significant, true}] = lists:sort(BadOpts);
  966: 	    ({AutoShutdown, ChildSpec = #{restart := permanent, significant := true}}) ->
  967: 		ChildSpec1 = CSFilter(ChildSpec),
  968: 		{error, {bad_combination, BadOpts}} =
  969: 		    supervisor:check_childspecs([ChildSpec1], AutoShutdown),
  970: 		[{restart, permanent}, {significant, true}] = lists:sort(BadOpts);
  971: 	    ({AutoShutdown, ChildSpec}) ->
  972: 		ChildSpec1 = CSFilter(ChildSpec),
  973: 		ok = supervisor:check_childspecs([ChildSpec1], AutoShutdown)
  974: 	end,
  975: 	[
  976: 	    {AutoShutdown,
  977: 	     CS0#{restart => Restart,
  978: 		  shutdown => Shutdown,
  979: 		  type => Type,
  980: 		  modules => Modules,
  981: 		  significant => Significant,
  982: 		  dummy => Dummy}}
  983: 	    ||
  984: 		AutoShutdown <- [undefined, never, any_significant, all_significant],
  985: 		Restart <- [undefined, permanent, transient, temporary],
  986: 		Shutdown <- [undefined, 0, 1000, infinity, brutal_kill],
  987: 		Type <- [undefined, supervisor, worker],
  988: 		Modules <- [undefined, dynamic, [], [m], [m1, m2]],
  989: 		Significant <- [undefined, true, false],
  990: 		Dummy <- [undefined, dummy]
  991: 	]
  992:     ),
  993: 
  994:     {error,{duplicate_child_name,child}} = supervisor:check_childspecs([CS0,CS0]),
  995: 
  996:     terminate(Pid, shutdown),
  997: 
  998:     %% Faulty child specs in supervisor start
  999:     {error, {start_spec, {invalid_mfa, mfa}}} =
 1000: 	 start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [B4]}}),
 1001:     {error, {start_spec, {invalid_restart_type, prmanent}}} =
 1002: 	start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [B5]}}),
 1003: 
 1004:     %% simple_one_for_one needs exactly one child
 1005:     {error,{bad_start_spec,[]}} =
 1006: 	start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1007:     {error,{bad_start_spec,[CS0,CS0]}} =
 1008: 	start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [CS0,CS0]}}),
 1009: 
 1010:     %% auto_shutdown => never should not accept significant children
 1011:     {error, {start_spec, {bad_combination, _}}} =
 1012: 	start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, [CS0#{significant => true}]}}),
 1013: 
 1014:     ok.
 1015: 
 1016: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1017: %% Test error handling of supervisor flags
 1018: sup_flags(_Config) ->
 1019:     process_flag(trap_exit,true),
 1020:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_strategy,_}}} =
 1021: 	start_link({ok, {{none_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1022:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_strategy,_}}} =
 1023: 	start_link({ok, {#{strategy=>none_for_one}, []}}),
 1024:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_intensity,_}}} =
 1025: 	start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, infinity, 3600}, []}}),
 1026:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_intensity,_}}} =
 1027: 	start_link({ok, {#{intensity=>infinity}, []}}),
 1028:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_period,_}}} =
 1029: 	start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 0}, []}}),
 1030:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_period,_}}} =
 1031: 	start_link({ok, {#{period=>0}, []}}),
 1032:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_period,_}}} =
 1033: 	start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, infinity}, []}}),
 1034:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_period,_}}} =
 1035: 	start_link({ok, {#{period=>infinity}, []}}),
 1036:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_auto_shutdown,_}}} =
 1037: 	start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown=>sometimes}, []}}),
 1038: 
 1039:     %% SupFlags other than a map or a 3-tuple
 1040:     {error,{supervisor_data,{invalid_type,_}}} =
 1041: 	start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2}, []}}),
 1042: 
 1043:     %% Unexpected flags are ignored
 1044:     {ok,Pid} = start_link({ok,{#{silly_flag=>true},[]}}),
 1045:     terminate(Pid,shutdown),
 1046: 
 1047:     ok.
 1048: 
 1049: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1050: external_start_no_progress_log(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1051:     ok = logger:add_handler(?MODULE, ?MODULE, #{test_case_pid => self()}),
 1052:     Filter = {fun logger_filters:domain/2,{log,sub,[otp,sasl]}},
 1053:     logger:add_handler_filter(?MODULE, filter_non_sasl, Filter),
 1054:     logger:set_module_level([supervisor], info),
 1055:     permanent_normal(Config),
 1056:     receive
 1057:         ok ->
 1058:             ok = logger:remove_handler(?MODULE);
 1059:         {fail, Msg} ->
 1060:             ok = logger:remove_handler(?MODULE),
 1061:             ct:fail({"unexpected progress report", Msg})
 1062:     end.
 1063: 
 1064: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1065: %% A permanent child should always be restarted.
 1066: permanent_normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1067:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1068:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1069: 	      worker, []},
 1070:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1071:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, normal),
 1072:     [{child1, Pid ,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1073:     case is_pid(Pid) of
 1074: 	true ->
 1075: 	    ok;
 1076: 	false ->
 1077: 	    ct:fail({permanent_child_not_restarted, Child1})
 1078:     end,
 1079:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1080: 
 1081: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1082: %% A transient child should not be restarted if it exits with reason
 1083: %% normal.
 1084: transient_normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1085:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1086:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, transient, 1000,
 1087: 	      worker, []},
 1088: 
 1089:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1090: 
 1091:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, normal),
 1092: 
 1093:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1094:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1095: 
 1096: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1097: %% A temporary process should never be restarted.
 1098: temporary_normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1099:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1100:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000,
 1101: 	      worker, []},
 1102: 
 1103:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1104: 
 1105:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, normal),
 1106: 
 1107:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1108:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1109: 
 1110: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1111: %% A permanent child should always be restarted.
 1112: permanent_shutdown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1113:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1114:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1115: 	      worker, []},
 1116: 
 1117:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1118: 
 1119:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, shutdown),
 1120: 
 1121:     [{child1, CPid2 ,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1122:     case is_pid(CPid2) of
 1123: 	true ->
 1124: 	    ok;
 1125: 	false ->
 1126: 	    ct:fail({permanent_child_not_restarted, Child1})
 1127:     end,
 1128:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1129: 
 1130:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child1, {shutdown, some_info}),
 1131: 
 1132:     [{child1, CPid3 ,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1133:     case is_pid(CPid3) of
 1134: 	true ->
 1135: 	    ok;
 1136: 	false ->
 1137: 	    ct:fail({permanent_child_not_restarted, Child1})
 1138:     end,
 1139: 
 1140:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1141: 
 1142: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1143: %% A transient child should not be restarted if it exits with reason
 1144: %% shutdown or {shutdown,Term}.
 1145: transient_shutdown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1146:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1147:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, transient, 1000,
 1148: 	      worker, []},
 1149: 
 1150:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1151: 
 1152:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, shutdown),
 1153: 
 1154:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1155:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1156: 
 1157:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
 1158: 
 1159:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child1, {shutdown, some_info}),
 1160: 
 1161:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1162:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1163: 
 1164: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1165: %% A temporary process should never be restarted.
 1166: temporary_shutdown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1167:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1168:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000,
 1169: 	      worker, []},
 1170: 
 1171:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1172: 
 1173:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, shutdown),
 1174: 
 1175:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1176:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1177: 
 1178:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1179: 
 1180:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child1, {shutdown, some_info}),
 1181: 
 1182:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1183:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1184: 
 1185: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1186: %% Faulty application should shutdown and pass on errors
 1187: faulty_application_shutdown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1188: 
 1189:     %% Set some paths
 1190:     AppDir  = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config), "app_faulty"),
 1191:     EbinDir = filename:join(AppDir, "ebin"),
 1192: 
 1193:     %% Start faulty app
 1194:     code:add_patha(EbinDir),
 1195: 
 1196:     %% {error,
 1197:     %%  {{shutdown,
 1198:     %%    {failed_to_start_child,
 1199:     %% 	app_faulty,
 1200:     %% 	{undef,
 1201:     %% 	 [{an_undefined_module_with,an_undefined_function,[argument1,argument2],
 1202:     %% 	   []},
 1203:     %% 	  {app_faulty_server,init,1,
 1204:     %% 	   [{file,"app_faulty/src/app_faulty_server.erl"},{line,16}]},
 1205:     %% 	  {gen_server,init_it,6,
 1206:     %% 	   [{file,"gen_server.erl"},{line,304}]},
 1207:     %% 	  {proc_lib,init_p_do_apply,3,
 1208:     %% 	   [{file,"proc_lib.erl"},{line,227}]}]}}},
 1209:     %%   {app_faulty,start,[normal,[]]}}}
 1210: 
 1211:     {error, Error} = application:start(app_faulty),
 1212:     {{shutdown, {failed_to_start_child,app_faulty,{undef, CallStack}}},
 1213:      {app_faulty,start,_}} = Error,
 1214:     [{an_undefined_module_with,an_undefined_function,_,_}|_] = CallStack,
 1215:     ok = application:unload(app_faulty),
 1216:     ok.
 1217: 
 1218: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1219: %% A permanent child should always be restarted.
 1220: permanent_abnormal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1221:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1222:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1223: 	      worker, []},
 1224: 
 1225:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1226:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1227: 
 1228:     [{child1, Pid ,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1229:     case is_pid(Pid) of
 1230: 	true ->
 1231: 	    ok;
 1232: 	false ->
 1233: 	    ct:fail({permanent_child_not_restarted, Child1})
 1234:     end,
 1235:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1236: 
 1237: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1238: %% A transient child should be restarted if it exits with reason abnormal.
 1239: transient_abnormal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1240:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1241:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, transient, 1000,
 1242: 	      worker, []},
 1243: 
 1244:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1245:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1246: 
 1247:     [{child1, Pid ,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1248:     case is_pid(Pid) of
 1249: 	true ->
 1250: 	    ok;
 1251: 	false ->
 1252: 	    ct:fail({transient_child_not_restarted, Child1})
 1253:     end,
 1254:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1255: 
 1256: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1257: %% A temporary process should never be restarted.
 1258: temporary_abnormal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1259:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1260:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000,
 1261: 	      worker, []},
 1262: 
 1263:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1264:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1265: 
 1266:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1267:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1268: 
 1269: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1270: %% A temporary process killed as part of a rest_for_one or one_for_all
 1271: %% restart strategy should not be restarted given its args are not
 1272: %% saved. Otherwise the supervisor hits its limit and crashes.
 1273: temporary_bystander(_Config) ->
 1274:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 100,
 1275: 	      worker, []},
 1276:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 100,
 1277: 	      worker, []},
 1278:     {ok, SupPid1} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{one_for_all, 2, 300}, []}}),
 1279:     {ok, SupPid2} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{rest_for_one, 2, 300}, []}}),
 1280:     unlink(SupPid1), % otherwise we crash with it
 1281:     unlink(SupPid2), % otherwise we crash with it
 1282:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid1, Child1),
 1283:     {ok, _CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid1, Child2),
 1284:     {ok, CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid2, Child1),
 1285:     {ok, _CPid4} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid2, Child2),
 1286:     terminate(SupPid1, CPid1, child1, normal),
 1287:     terminate(SupPid2, CPid3, child1, normal),
 1288:     timer:sleep(350),
 1289:     catch link(SupPid1),
 1290:     catch link(SupPid2),
 1291:     %% The supervisor would die attempting to restart child2
 1292:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(SupPid1),
 1293:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(SupPid2),
 1294:     %% Child2 has not been restarted
 1295:     [{child1, _, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid1),
 1296:     [{child1, _, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid2).
 1297: 
 1298: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1299: %% Test restarting a process multiple times, being careful not
 1300: %% to exceed the maximum restart frquency.
 1301: multiple_restarts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1302:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1303:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 1304: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 1305: 	       restart => permanent,
 1306: 	       shutdown => brutal_kill,
 1307: 	       type => worker,
 1308: 	       modules => []},
 1309:     SupFlags = #{strategy => one_for_one,
 1310: 		 intensity => 1,
 1311: 		 period => 1},
 1312:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {SupFlags, []}}),
 1313:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1314: 
 1315:     %% Terminate the process several times, but being careful
 1316:     %% not to exceed the maximum restart intensity.
 1317:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1318:     _ = [begin
 1319: 	     receive after 2100 -> ok end,
 1320: 	     [{_, Pid, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1321: 	     terminate(SupPid, Pid, child1, abnormal)
 1322: 	 end || _ <- [1,2,3]],
 1323: 
 1324:     %% Verify that the supervisor is still alive and clean up.
 1325:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(SupPid, child1),
 1326:     ok = supervisor:delete_child(SupPid, child1),
 1327:     exit(SupPid, kill),
 1328:     ok.
 1329: 
 1330: 
 1331: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1332: %% Test the one_for_one base case.
 1333: one_for_one(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1334:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1335:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1336: 	      worker, []},
 1337:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1338: 	      worker, []},
 1339:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1340:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1341:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1342: 
 1343:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1344:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1345:     if length(Children) == 2 ->
 1346: 	    case lists:keysearch(CPid2, 2, Children) of
 1347: 		{value, _} -> ok;
 1348: 		_ ->  ct:fail(bad_child)
 1349: 	    end;
 1350:        true ->  ct:fail({bad_child_list, Children})
 1351:     end,
 1352:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1353: 
 1354:     %% Test restart frequency property
 1355:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child2, abnormal),
 1356: 
 1357:     [{Id4, Pid4, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1358:     terminate(SupPid, Pid4, Id4, abnormal),
 1359:     check_exit([SupPid]).
 1360: 
 1361: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1362: %% Test restart escalation on a one_for_one supervisor.
 1363: one_for_one_escalation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1364:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1365: 
 1366:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [error]},
 1367: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1368: 	      worker, []},
 1369:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1370: 	      worker, []},
 1371: 
 1372:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 4, 3600}, []}}),
 1373:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1374:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1375:     link(CPid2),
 1376: 
 1377:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1378:     check_exit([SupPid, CPid2]).
 1379: 
 1380: 
 1381: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1382: %% Test the one_for_all base case.
 1383: one_for_all(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1384:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1385: 
 1386:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1387: 	     worker, []},
 1388:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1389: 	     worker, []},
 1390:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_all, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1391:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1392:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1393:     link(CPid2),
 1394: 
 1395:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1396:     check_exit([CPid2]),
 1397: 
 1398:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1399:     if length(Children) == 2 -> ok;
 1400:        true ->
 1401: 	    ct:fail({bad_child_list, Children})
 1402:     end,
 1403: 
 1404:     %% Test that no old children is still alive
 1405:     not_in_child_list([CPid1, CPid2], lists:map(fun({_,P,_,_}) -> P end, Children)),
 1406: 
 1407:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1408: 
 1409:     %%% Test restart frequency property
 1410:     [{Id3, Pid3, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1411:     terminate(SupPid, Pid3, Id3, abnormal),
 1412:     [{Id4, Pid4, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1413:     terminate(SupPid, Pid4, Id4, abnormal),
 1414:     check_exit([SupPid]).
 1415: 
 1416: 
 1417: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1418: %% Test restart escalation on a one_for_all supervisor.
 1419: one_for_all_escalation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1420:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1421: 
 1422:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1423: 	     worker, []},
 1424:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, [error]},
 1425: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1426: 	     worker, []},
 1427:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_all, 4, 3600}, []}}),
 1428:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1429:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1430:     link(CPid2),
 1431: 
 1432:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1433:     check_exit([CPid2, SupPid]).
 1434: 
 1435: 
 1436: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1437: %% Test that the supervisor terminates a restarted child when a different
 1438: %% child fails to start.
 1439: one_for_all_other_child_fails_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1440:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1441:     Self = self(),
 1442:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_3, start_child, [child1, Self]},
 1443: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 1444:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_3, start_child, [child2, Self]},
 1445: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 1446:     Children = [Child1, Child2],
 1447:     StarterFun = fun() ->
 1448: 	    {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_all, 3, 3600}, Children}}),
 1449: 	    Self ! {sup_pid, SupPid},
 1450: 	    receive {stop, Self} -> ok end
 1451:     end,
 1452:     StarterPid = spawn_link(StarterFun),
 1453:     Ok = {{ok, undefined}, Self},
 1454:     %% Let the children start.
 1455:     Child1Pid = receive {child1, Pid1} -> Pid1 end,
 1456:     Child1Pid ! Ok,
 1457:     Child2Pid = receive {child2, Pid2} -> Pid2 end,
 1458:     Child2Pid ! Ok,
 1459:     %% Supervisor started.
 1460:     SupPid = receive {sup_pid, Pid} -> Pid end,
 1461:     link(SupPid),
 1462:     exit(Child1Pid, die),
 1463:     %% Let child1 restart but don't let child2.
 1464:     Child1Pid2  = receive {child1, Pid3} -> Pid3 end,
 1465:     Child1Pid2Ref = erlang:monitor(process, Child1Pid2),
 1466:     Child1Pid2 ! Ok,
 1467:     Child2Pid2 = receive {child2, Pid4} -> Pid4 end,
 1468:     Child2Pid2 ! {{stop, normal}, Self},
 1469:     %% Check child1 is terminated.
 1470:     receive
 1471: 	{'DOWN', Child1Pid2Ref, _, _, shutdown} ->
 1472: 	    ok;
 1473: 	{_childName, _Pid} ->
 1474: 	    exit(SupPid, kill),
 1475: 	    check_exit([StarterPid, SupPid]),
 1476: 	    ct:fail({restarting_child_not_terminated, Child1Pid2})
 1477:     end,
 1478:     %% Let the restart complete.
 1479:     Child1Pid3 = receive {child1, Pid5} -> Pid5 end,
 1480:     Child1Pid3 ! Ok,
 1481:     Child2Pid3 = receive {child2, Pid6} -> Pid6 end,
 1482:     Child2Pid3 ! Ok,
 1483:     StarterPid ! {stop, Self},
 1484:     check_exit([StarterPid, SupPid]).
 1485: 
 1486: 
 1487: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1488: %% Test the simple_one_for_one base case.
 1489: simple_one_for_one(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1490:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1491:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1492: 	     worker, []},
 1493:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1494:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1495:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1496: 
 1497:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1498: 
 1499:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1500:     if length(Children) == 2 ->
 1501: 	    case lists:keysearch(CPid2, 2, Children) of
 1502: 		{value, _} -> ok;
 1503: 		_ ->  ct:fail(bad_child)
 1504: 	    end;
 1505:        true ->  ct:fail({bad_child_list, Children})
 1506:     end,
 1507:     [1,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1508: 
 1509:     %% Test restart frequency property
 1510:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child2, abnormal),
 1511: 
 1512:     [{Id4, Pid4, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1513: 
 1514:     terminate(SupPid, Pid4, Id4, abnormal),
 1515:     check_exit_reason(SupPid,shutdown).
 1516: 
 1517: 
 1518: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1519: %% Test simple_one_for_one children restarts and returning ignore.
 1520: simple_one_for_one_restart_ignore(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1521:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1522:     Self = self(),
 1523:     lists:foreach(
 1524:         fun(Restart) ->
 1525:             Child = {child, {supervisor_3, start_child, []}, Restart, 1000, worker, []},
 1526:             {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 10, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1527:             StarterPid1 = spawn_link(fun() -> supervisor:start_child(SupPid, [child1, Self]) end),
 1528:             ChildPid1 = receive {child1, CPid1} -> CPid1 end,
 1529:             ChildPid1 ! {{ok, 0}, Self},
 1530:             check_exit([StarterPid1]),
 1531:             [{undefined, ChildPid1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 1532:             terminate(ChildPid1, kill),
 1533:             ChildPid2 = receive {child1, CPid2} -> CPid2 end,
 1534:             ChildPid2 ! {{ok, 0}, Self},
 1535:             [{undefined, ChildPid2, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 1536:             terminate(ChildPid2, kill),
 1537:             ChildPid3 = receive {child1, CPid3} -> CPid3 end,
 1538:             ChildPid3 ! {ignore, Self},
 1539:             [] = supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 1540:             terminate(SupPid, shutdown),
 1541:             ok = check_exit_reason(SupPid, shutdown)
 1542:         end,
 1543:         [transient, permanent]
 1544:     ).
 1545: 
 1546: 
 1547: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1548: %% Test simple_one_for_one children shutdown accordingly to the
 1549: %% supervisor's shutdown strategy.
 1550: simple_one_for_one_shutdown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1551:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1552:     ShutdownTime = 1000,
 1553:     Child = {child, {supervisor_2, start_child, []},
 1554:              permanent, 2*ShutdownTime, worker, []},
 1555:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1556: 
 1557:     %% Will be gracefully shutdown
 1558:     {ok, _CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, [ShutdownTime]),
 1559:     {ok, _CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, [ShutdownTime]),
 1560: 
 1561:     %% Will be killed after 2*ShutdownTime milliseconds
 1562:     {ok, _CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, [5*ShutdownTime]),
 1563: 
 1564:     {T, ok} = timer:tc(fun terminate/2, [SupPid, shutdown]),
 1565:     if T < 1000*ShutdownTime ->
 1566:             %% Because supervisor's children wait before exiting, it can't
 1567:             %% terminate quickly
 1568:             ct:fail({shutdown_too_short, T});
 1569:        T >= 1000*5*ShutdownTime ->
 1570:             ct:fail({shutdown_too_long, T});
 1571:        true ->
 1572:             check_exit([SupPid])
 1573:     end.
 1574: 
 1575: 
 1576: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1577: %% Tests automatic restart of children who's start function return
 1578: %% extra info.
 1579: simple_one_for_one_extra(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1580:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1581:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, [extra_info]}, 
 1582: 	     permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 1583:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1584:     {ok, CPid1, extra_info} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1585:     {ok, CPid2, extra_info} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1586:     link(CPid2),
 1587:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1588:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1589:     if length(Children) == 2 ->
 1590: 	    case lists:keysearch(CPid2, 2, Children) of
 1591: 		{value, _} -> ok;
 1592: 		_ ->  ct:fail(bad_child)
 1593: 	    end;
 1594:        true ->  ct:fail({bad_child_list, Children})
 1595:     end,
 1596:     [1,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1597:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child2, abnormal),
 1598:     [{Id4, Pid4, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1599:     terminate(SupPid, Pid4, Id4, abnormal),
 1600:     check_exit([SupPid]).
 1601: 
 1602: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1603: %% Test for subtle corruption of internal state for a
 1604: %% simple_one_for_one supervisor. Thanks to Zeyu Zhang (@zzydxm) and
 1605: %% Maxim Fedorov for noticing this bug. (OTP-16804)
 1606: simple_one_for_one_corruption(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1607:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1608: 
 1609:     logger:add_handler(?MODULE, ?MODULE, #{test_case_pid => self()}),
 1610: 
 1611:     try
 1612:         Child = #{id => child, start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 1613:                   restart => temporary, shutdown => 1000,
 1614:                   type => worker, modules => []},
 1615:         {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1616:         {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1617: 
 1618:         terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1619: 
 1620:         %% The first time a child of simple_one_for_one supervisor
 1621:         %% with restart strategy `temporary` dies, the internal state
 1622:         %% for the supervisor will become inconsistent (the `dynamics`
 1623:         %% field would change from `{mapsets,Map}` to
 1624:         %% `{maps,Map}`). That inconsistency will make the supervisor
 1625:         %% retain the start arguments even for temporary processes.
 1626:         %%
 1627:         %% To test that the bug is fixed, start a new child process
 1628:         %% with a large term in its argument list.
 1629: 
 1630:         N = 50000,
 1631:         BigData = binary_to_list(<<0:N/unit:8>>),
 1632:         {ok, CPid2, BigData} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, [BigData]),
 1633: 
 1634:         %% Since the child is temporary, the supervisor should not keep
 1635:         %% the argument list for the child and the supervisor's heap
 1636:         %% size should shrink after a GC.
 1637: 
 1638:         true = erlang:garbage_collect(SupPid),
 1639:         {total_heap_size, HeapSize} = process_info(SupPid, total_heap_size),
 1640:         if
 1641:             HeapSize > 2*N ->
 1642:                 %% The start arguments for the child have been kept.
 1643:                 ct:fail({excessive_heap_size,HeapSize});
 1644:             true ->
 1645:                 ok
 1646:         end,
 1647: 
 1648:         terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child2, abnormal),
 1649: 
 1650:         exit(SupPid, kill)
 1651:     after
 1652:         logger:remove_handler(?MODULE)
 1653:     end,
 1654: 
 1655:     ok.
 1656: 
 1657: 
 1658: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1659: %% Test restart escalation on a simple_one_for_one supervisor.
 1660: simple_one_for_one_escalation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1661:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1662:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1663: 	     worker, []},
 1664:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 4, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1665:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, [error]),
 1666:     link(CPid1),
 1667:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 1668:     link(CPid2),
 1669: 
 1670:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child, abnormal),
 1671:     check_exit([SupPid, CPid2]).
 1672: 
 1673: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1674: %% Test the rest_for_one base case.
 1675: rest_for_one(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1676:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1677:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1678: 	     worker, []},
 1679:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1680: 	     worker, []},
 1681:     Child3 = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1682: 	     worker, []},
 1683:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{rest_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1684:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1685:     link(CPid1),
 1686:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1687:     {ok, CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child3),
 1688:     link(CPid3),
 1689:     [3,3,0,3] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1690: 
 1691:     terminate(SupPid, CPid2, child2, abnormal),
 1692: 
 1693:     %% Check that Cpid3 did die
 1694:     check_exit([CPid3]),
 1695: 
 1696:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1697:     is_in_child_list([CPid1], Children),
 1698: 
 1699:     if length(Children) == 3 ->
 1700: 	    ok;
 1701:        true ->
 1702: 	    ct:fail({bad_child_list, Children})
 1703:     end,
 1704:     [3,3,0,3] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1705: 
 1706:     %% Test that no old children is still alive
 1707:     Pids = lists:map(fun({_,P,_,_}) -> P end, Children),
 1708:     not_in_child_list([CPid2, CPid3], Pids),
 1709:     in_child_list([CPid1], Pids),
 1710: 
 1711:     %% Test restart frequency property
 1712:     [{child3, Pid3, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1713: 
 1714:     terminate(SupPid, Pid3, child3, abnormal),
 1715: 
 1716:     [_,{child2, Pid4, _, _}|_] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1717: 
 1718:     terminate(SupPid, Pid4, child2, abnormal),
 1719:     check_exit([SupPid]).
 1720: 
 1721: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1722: %% Test restart escalation on a rest_for_one supervisor.
 1723: rest_for_one_escalation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1724:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1725:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000,
 1726: 	     worker, []},
