 1727:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, [error]},
 1728: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1729: 	     worker, []},
 1730:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{rest_for_one, 4, 3600}, []}}),
 1731:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 1732:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 1733:     link(CPid2),
 1734: 
 1735:     terminate(SupPid, CPid1, child1, abnormal),
 1736:     check_exit([CPid2, SupPid]).
 1737: 
 1738: 
 1739: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1740: %% Test that the supervisor terminates a restarted child when a different
 1741: %% child fails to start.
 1742: rest_for_one_other_child_fails_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1743:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1744:     Self = self(),
 1745:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_3, start_child, [child1, Self]},
 1746: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 1747:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_3, start_child, [child2, Self]},
 1748: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 1749:     Children = [Child1, Child2],
 1750:     StarterFun = fun() ->
 1751: 	    {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{rest_for_one, 3, 3600}, Children}}),
 1752: 	    Self ! {sup_pid, SupPid},
 1753: 	    receive {stop, Self} -> ok end
 1754:     end,
 1755:     StarterPid = spawn_link(StarterFun),
 1756:     Ok = {{ok, undefined}, Self},
 1757:     %% Let the children start.
 1758:     Child1Pid = receive {child1, Pid1} -> Pid1 end,
 1759:     Child1Pid ! Ok,
 1760:     Child2Pid = receive {child2, Pid2} -> Pid2 end,
 1761:     Child2Pid ! Ok,
 1762:     %% Supervisor started.
 1763:     SupPid = receive {sup_pid, Pid} -> Pid end,
 1764:     link(SupPid),
 1765:     exit(Child1Pid, die),
 1766:     %% Let child1 restart but don't let child2.
 1767:     Child1Pid2  = receive {child1, Pid3} -> Pid3 end,
 1768:     Child1Pid2 ! Ok,
 1769:     Child2Pid2 = receive {child2, Pid4} -> Pid4 end,
 1770:     Child2Pid2 ! {{stop, normal}, Self},
 1771: 	%% Let child2 restart.
 1772:     receive
 1773: 	{child2, Child2Pid3} ->
 1774: 	    Child2Pid3 ! Ok;
 1775: 	{child1, _Child1Pid3} ->
 1776: 	    exit(SupPid, kill),
 1777: 	    check_exit([StarterPid, SupPid]),
 1778: 	    ct:fail({restarting_started_child, Child1Pid2})
 1779:     end,
 1780:     StarterPid ! {stop, Self},
 1781:     check_exit([StarterPid, SupPid]).
 1782: 
 1783: 
 1784: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1785: %% Test that the supervisor does not hang forever if the child unliks
 1786: %% and then is terminated by the supervisor.
 1787: child_unlink(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1788: 
 1789:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 1790: 
 1791:     Child = {naughty_child, {naughty_child, 
 1792: 			     start_link, [SupPid]}, permanent, 
 1793: 	     1000, worker, [supervisor_SUITE]},
 1794: 
 1795:     {ok, _ChildPid} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child),
 1796: 
 1797:     Pid = spawn(supervisor, terminate_child, [SupPid, naughty_child]),
 1798: 
 1799:     SupPid ! foo,
 1800:     timer:sleep(5000),
 1801:     %% If the supervisor did not hang it will have got rid of the 
 1802:     %% foo message that we sent.
 1803:     case erlang:process_info(SupPid, message_queue_len) of
 1804: 	{message_queue_len, 0}->
 1805: 	    ok;
 1806: 	_ ->
 1807: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
 1808: 	    ct:fail(supervisor_hangs)
 1809:     end.
 1810: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1811: %% Test a basic supervison tree.
 1812: tree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1813:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1814: 
 1815:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 1816: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1817: 	      worker, []},
 1818:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 1819: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1820: 	      worker, []},
 1821:     Child3 = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, [error]},
 1822: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1823: 	      worker, []},
 1824:     Child4 = {child4, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 1825: 	      permanent, 1000,
 1826: 	      worker, []},
 1827: 
 1828:     ChildSup1 = {supchild1, 
 1829: 		 {supervisor, start_link,
 1830: 		  [?MODULE, {ok, {{one_for_one, 4, 3600}, [Child1, Child2]}}]},
 1831: 		 permanent, infinity,
 1832: 		 supervisor, []},
 1833:     ChildSup2 = {supchild2, 
 1834: 		 {supervisor, start_link, 
 1835: 		  [?MODULE, {ok, {{one_for_one, 4, 3600}, []}}]},
 1836: 		 permanent, infinity,
 1837: 		 supervisor, []},
 1838:     ChildSup3 = {supchild3,
 1839: 		 {supervisor, start_link,
 1840: 		  [?MODULE, {ok, {{one_for_one, 4, 3600}, []}}]},
 1841: 		 transient, infinity,
 1842: 		 supervisor, []},
 1843: 
 1844:     %% Top supervisor
 1845:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_all, 4, 3600}, []}}),
 1846: 
 1847:     %% Child supervisors  
 1848:     {ok, Sup1} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, ChildSup1),
 1849:     {ok, Sup2} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, ChildSup2),
 1850:     {ok, _Sup3} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, ChildSup3),
 1851:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(SupPid, supchild3),
 1852:     [3,2,3,0] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 1853: 
 1854:     %% Workers
 1855:     [{_, CPid2, _, _},{_, CPid1, _, _}] =
 1856: 	supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 1857:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(Sup1),
 1858:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(Sup2),
 1859: 
 1860:     %% Dynamic children
 1861:     {ok, CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child3),
 1862:     {ok, CPid4} = supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child4),
 1863:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(Sup1),
 1864:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(Sup2),
 1865: 
 1866:     %% Test that the only the process that dies is restarted
 1867:     terminate(Sup2, CPid4, child4, abnormal),
 1868: 
 1869:     [{_, CPid2, _, _},{_, CPid1, _, _}] =
 1870: 	supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 1871:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(Sup1),
 1872: 
 1873:     [{_, NewCPid4, _, _},{_, CPid3, _, _}] =
 1874: 	supervisor:which_children(Sup2),
 1875:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(Sup2),
 1876: 
 1877:     false = NewCPid4 == CPid4,
 1878: 
 1879:     %% Test that supervisor tree is restarted, but not dynamic children.
 1880:     terminate(Sup2, CPid3, child3, abnormal),
 1881: 
 1882:     timer:sleep(1000),
 1883: 
 1884:     [{supchild3, NewSup3, _, _},
 1885:      {supchild2, NewSup2, _, _},
 1886:      {supchild1, NewSup1, _, _}] =
 1887: 	supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 1888:     [3,3,3,0] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 1889: 
 1890:     [{child2, _, _, _},{child1, _, _, _}]  =
 1891: 	supervisor:which_children(NewSup1),
 1892:     [2,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(NewSup1),
 1893: 
 1894:     [] = supervisor:which_children(NewSup2),
 1895:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(NewSup2),
 1896: 
 1897:     [] = supervisor:which_children(NewSup3),
 1898:     [0,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(NewSup3).
 1899: 
 1900: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1901: %% Test count_children
 1902: count_children(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1903:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1904:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000,
 1905: 	     worker, []},
 1906:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1907:     [supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []) || _Ignore <- lists:seq(1,1000)],
 1908: 
 1909:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1910:     ChildCount = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1911: 
 1912:     [supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []) || _Ignore2 <- lists:seq(1,1000)],
 1913: 
 1914:     ChildCount2 = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1915:     Children2 = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1916: 
 1917:     ChildCount3 = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1918:     Children3 = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1919: 
 1920:     1000 = length(Children),
 1921:     [1,1000,0,1000] = ChildCount,
 1922:     2000 = length(Children2),
 1923:     [1,2000,0,2000] = ChildCount2,
 1924:     Children3 = Children2,
 1925:     ChildCount3 = ChildCount2,
 1926: 
 1927:     [terminate(SupPid, Pid, child, kill) || {undefined, Pid, worker, _Modules} <- Children3],
 1928:     [1,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1929: 
 1930: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1931: %% Test count_children for simple_one_for_one, when children are supervisors
 1932: count_children_supervisor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1933:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1934:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, infinity,
 1935: 	     supervisor, []},
 1936:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 1937:     [supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []) || _Ignore <- lists:seq(1,1000)],
 1938: 
 1939:     Children = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1940:     ChildCount = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1941: 
 1942:     [supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []) || _Ignore2 <- lists:seq(1,1000)],
 1943: 
 1944:     ChildCount2 = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1945:     Children2 = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1946: 
 1947:     ChildCount3 = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 1948:     Children3 = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 1949: 
 1950:     1000 = length(Children),
 1951:     [1,1000,1000,0] = ChildCount,
 1952:     2000 = length(Children2),
 1953:     [1,2000,2000,0] = ChildCount2,
 1954:     Children3 = Children2,
 1955:     ChildCount3 = ChildCount2,
 1956: 
 1957:     [terminate(SupPid, Pid, child, kill) || {undefined, Pid, supervisor, _Modules} <- Children3],
 1958:     [1,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(sup_test).
 1959: 
 1960: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1961: %% Test count_children when some children are restarting
 1962: count_restarting_children(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1963:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1964:     Child = {child, {supervisor_deadlock, start_child_noreg, []},
 1965: 	     permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 1966:     %% 2 sek delay on failing restart (see supervisor_deadlock.erl) ->
 1967:     %% MaxR=20, MaxT=10 should ensure a restart loop when starting and
 1968:     %% restarting 3 instances of the child (as below)
 1969:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 20, 10}, [Child]}}),
 1970: 
 1971:     %% Ets table with state read by supervisor_deadlock.erl
 1972:     ets:new(supervisor_deadlock,[set,named_table,public]),
 1973:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 1974: 
 1975:     [1,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 1976:     {ok, Ch1_1} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, []),
 1977:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 1978:     {ok, Ch1_2} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, []),
 1979:     [1,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 1980:     {ok, Ch1_3} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, []),
 1981:     [1,3,0,3] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 1982: 
 1983:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(Ch1_1),
 1984:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(Ch1_2),
 1985:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(Ch1_3),
 1986:     ct:sleep(400),
 1987:     [1,3,0,3] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 1988:     [Ch2_1, Ch2_2, Ch2_3] = [C || {_,C,_,_} <- supervisor:which_children(SupPid)],
 1989: 
 1990:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 1991:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(Ch2_1),
 1992:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(Ch2_2),
 1993:     ct:sleep(4000),	   % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 1994:     [1,1,0,3] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 1995: 
 1996:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 1997:     ct:sleep(4000),	   % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 1998:     [1,3,0,3] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 1999: 
 2000:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(SupPid, Ch2_3),
 2001:     [1,2,0,2] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 2002:     [Ch3_1, Ch3_2] = [C || {_,C,_,_} <- supervisor:which_children(SupPid)],
 2003:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(SupPid, Ch3_1),
 2004:     [1,1,0,1] = get_child_counts(SupPid),
 2005:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(SupPid, Ch3_2),
 2006:     [1,0,0,0] = get_child_counts(SupPid).
 2007: 
 2008: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2009: %% Test get_callback_module
 2010: get_callback_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2011:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000,
 2012: 	     worker, []},
 2013:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 2014:     supervisor_SUITE = supervisor:get_callback_module(SupPid).
 2015: 
 2016: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2017: %% Temporary children shall not be restarted so they should not save
 2018: %% start parameters, as it potentially can take up a huge amount of
 2019: %% memory for no purpose.
 2020: do_not_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2021:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2022:     dont_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(one_for_all),
 2023:     dont_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(one_for_one),
 2024:     dont_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(rest_for_one),
 2025:     dont_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(simple_one_for_one).
 2026: 
 2027: start_children(_,_, 0) ->
 2028:     ok;
 2029: start_children(Sup, Args, N) ->
 2030:     Spec = child_spec(Args, N),
 2031:     {ok, _, _} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, Spec),
 2032:     start_children(Sup, Args, N-1).
 2033: 
 2034: child_spec([_|_] = SimpleOneForOneArgs, _) ->
 2035:     SimpleOneForOneArgs;
 2036: child_spec({Name, MFA, RestartType, Shutdown, Type, Modules}, N) ->
 2037:     NewName = list_to_atom((atom_to_list(Name) ++ integer_to_list(N))),
 2038:     {NewName, MFA, RestartType, Shutdown, Type, Modules}.
 2039: 
 2040: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2041: %% Temporary children shall not be restarted so supervisors should not
 2042: %% save their spec when they terminate.
 2043: do_not_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2044:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2045:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_all, kill),
 2046:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_one, kill),
 2047:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(rest_for_one, kill),
 2048: 
 2049:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_all, normal),
 2050:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_one, normal),
 2051:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(rest_for_one, normal),
 2052: 
 2053:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_all, abnormal),
 2054:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_one, abnormal),
 2055:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(rest_for_one, abnormal),
 2056: 
 2057:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_all, supervisor),
 2058:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(one_for_one, supervisor),
 2059:     dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(rest_for_one, supervisor).
 2060: 
 2061: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2062: dont_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(simple_one_for_one = Type) ->
 2063:     Permanent = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2064: 		 permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 2065:     Transient = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2066: 		 transient, 1000, worker, []},
 2067:     Temporary = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2068: 		 temporary, 1000, worker, []},
 2069:     {ok, Sup1} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, [Permanent]}}),
 2070:     {ok, Sup2} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, [Transient]}}),
 2071:     {ok, Sup3} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, [Temporary]}}),
 2072: 
 2073:     LargeList = lists:duplicate(10, "Potentially large"),
 2074: 
 2075:     start_children(Sup1, [LargeList], 100),
 2076:     start_children(Sup2, [LargeList], 100),
 2077:     start_children(Sup3, [LargeList], 100),
 2078: 
 2079:     Size1 = erts_debug:flat_size(sys:get_status(Sup1)),
 2080:     Size2 = erts_debug:flat_size(sys:get_status(Sup2)),
 2081:     Size3 = erts_debug:flat_size(sys:get_status(Sup3)),
 2082: 
 2083:     true = (Size3 < Size1)  and  (Size3 < Size2),
 2084: 
 2085:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 2086:     terminate(Sup2, shutdown),
 2087:     terminate(Sup3, shutdown);
 2088: 
 2089: dont_save_start_parameters_for_temporary_children(Type) ->
 2090:     {ok, Sup1} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 2091:     {ok, Sup2} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 2092:     {ok, Sup3} = supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 2093: 
 2094:     LargeList = lists:duplicate(10, "Potentially large"),
 2095: 
 2096:     Permanent = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, [LargeList]},
 2097: 		 permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 2098:     Transient = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, [LargeList]},
 2099: 		 transient, 1000, worker, []},
 2100:     Temporary = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, [LargeList]},
 2101: 		 temporary, 1000, worker, []},
 2102: 
 2103:     start_children(Sup1, Permanent, 100),
 2104:     start_children(Sup2, Transient, 100),
 2105:     start_children(Sup3, Temporary, 100),
 2106: 
 2107:     Size1 = erts_debug:flat_size(sys:get_status(Sup1)),
 2108:     Size2 = erts_debug:flat_size(sys:get_status(Sup2)),
 2109:     Size3 = erts_debug:flat_size(sys:get_status(Sup3)),
 2110: 
 2111:     true = (Size3 < Size1)  and  (Size3 < Size2),
 2112: 
 2113:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 2114:     terminate(Sup2, shutdown),
 2115:     terminate(Sup3, shutdown).
 2116: 
 2117: dont_save_child_specs_for_temporary_children(Type, TerminateHow)->
 2118:     {ok, Sup} =
 2119: 	supervisor:start_link(?MODULE, {ok, {{Type, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 2120: 
 2121:     Permanent = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2122: 		 permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 2123:     Transient = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2124: 		 transient, 1000, worker, []},
 2125:     Temporary = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2126: 		 temporary, 1000, worker, []},
 2127: 
 2128:     permanent_child_spec_saved(Permanent, Sup, TerminateHow),
 2129: 
 2130:     transient_child_spec_saved(Transient, Sup, TerminateHow),
 2131: 
 2132:     temporary_child_spec_not_saved(Temporary, Sup, TerminateHow),
 2133: 
 2134:     terminate(Sup, shutdown).
 2135: 
 2136: permanent_child_spec_saved(ChildSpec, Sup, supervisor = TerminateHow) ->
 2137:     already_present(Sup, ChildSpec, TerminateHow);
 2138: 
 2139: permanent_child_spec_saved(ChildSpec, Sup, TerminateHow) ->
 2140:     restarted(Sup, ChildSpec, TerminateHow).
 2141: 
 2142: transient_child_spec_saved(ChildSpec, Sup, supervisor = TerminateHow) ->
 2143:     already_present(Sup, ChildSpec, TerminateHow);
 2144: 
 2145: transient_child_spec_saved(ChildSpec, Sup, normal = TerminateHow) ->
 2146:     already_present(Sup, ChildSpec, TerminateHow);
 2147: 
 2148: transient_child_spec_saved(ChildSpec, Sup, TerminateHow) ->
 2149:     restarted(Sup, ChildSpec, TerminateHow).
 2150: 
 2151: temporary_child_spec_not_saved({Id, _,_,_,_,_} = ChildSpec, Sup, TerminateHow) ->
 2152:     {ok, Pid} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, ChildSpec),
 2153:     terminate(Sup, Pid, Id, TerminateHow),
 2154:     {ok, _} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, ChildSpec).
 2155: 
 2156: already_present(Sup, {Id,_,_,_,_,_} = ChildSpec, TerminateHow) ->
 2157:     {ok, Pid} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, ChildSpec),
 2158:     terminate(Sup, Pid, Id, TerminateHow),
 2159:     {error, already_present} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, ChildSpec),
 2160:     {ok, _} = supervisor:restart_child(Sup, Id).
 2161: 
 2162: restarted(Sup, {Id,_,_,_,_,_} = ChildSpec, TerminateHow) ->
 2163:     {ok, Pid} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, ChildSpec),
 2164:     terminate(Sup, Pid, Id, TerminateHow),
 2165:     %% Permanent processes will be restarted by the supervisor
 2166:     %% when not terminated by api
 2167:     {error, {already_started, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup, ChildSpec).
 2168: 
 2169: 
 2170: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2171: %% OTP-9242: Pids for dynamic temporary children were saved as a list,
 2172: %% which caused bad scaling when adding/deleting many processes.
 2173: simple_one_for_one_scale_many_temporary_children(_Config) ->
 2174:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2175:     Child = {child, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, temporary, 1000,
 2176: 	     worker, []},
 2177:     {ok, _SupPid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 2, 3600}, [Child]}}),
 2178: 
 2179:     C1 = [begin 
 2180: 		 {ok,P} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test,[]), 
 2181: 		 P
 2182: 	     end || _<- lists:seq(1,1000)],
 2183:     {T1,done} = timer:tc(?MODULE,terminate_all_children,[C1]),
 2184:     
 2185:     C2 = [begin 
 2186: 		 {ok,P} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test,[]), 
 2187: 		 P
 2188: 	     end || _<- lists:seq(1,10000)],
 2189:     {T2,done} = timer:tc(?MODULE,terminate_all_children,[C2]),
 2190:     
 2191:     if T1 > 0 ->
 2192: 	    Scaling = T2 div T1,
 2193: 	    if Scaling > 50 ->
 2194: 		    %% The scaling shoul be linear (i.e.10, really), but we
 2195: 		    %% give some extra here to avoid failing the test
 2196: 		    %% unecessarily.
 2197: 		    ct:fail({bad_scaling,Scaling});
 2198: 	       true ->
 2199: 		    ok
 2200: 	    end;
 2201:        true ->
 2202: 	    %% Means T2 div T1 -> infinity
 2203: 	    ok
 2204:     end.
 2205:     
 2206: 
 2207: terminate_all_children([C|Cs]) ->
 2208:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test,C),
 2209:     terminate_all_children(Cs);
 2210: terminate_all_children([]) ->
 2211:     done.
 2212: 
 2213: 
 2214: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2215: %% OTP-9212. Restart of global supervisor.
 2216: simple_global_supervisor(_Config) ->
 2217:     kill_supervisor(),
 2218:     kill_worker(),
 2219:     exit_worker(),
 2220:     restart_worker(),
 2221:     ok.
 2222: 
 2223: kill_supervisor() ->
 2224:     {Top, Sup2_1, Server_1} = start9212(),
 2225: 
 2226:     %% Killing a supervisor isn't really supported, but try it anyway...
 2227:     exit(Sup2_1, kill),
 2228:     timer:sleep(200),
 2229:     Sup2_2 = global:whereis_name(sup2),
 2230:     Server_2 = global:whereis_name(server),
 2231:     true = is_pid(Sup2_2),
 2232:     true = is_pid(Server_2),
 2233:     true = Sup2_1 =/= Sup2_2,
 2234:     true = Server_1 =/= Server_2,
 2235: 
 2236:     stop9212(Top).
 2237: 
 2238: handle_info({fail, With, After}, _State) ->
 2239:     timer:sleep(After),
 2240:     erlang:error(With).
 2241: 
 2242: kill_worker() ->
 2243:     {Top, _Sup2, Server_1} = start9212(),
 2244:     exit(Server_1, kill),
 2245:     timer:sleep(200),
 2246:     Server_2 = global:whereis_name(server),
 2247:     true = is_pid(Server_2),
 2248:     true = Server_1 =/= Server_2,
 2249:     stop9212(Top).
 2250: 
 2251: exit_worker() ->
 2252:     %% Very much the same as kill_worker().
 2253:     {Top, _Sup2, Server_1} = start9212(),
 2254:     Server_1 ! {fail, normal, 0},
 2255:     timer:sleep(200),
 2256:     Server_2 = global:whereis_name(server),
 2257:     true = is_pid(Server_2),
 2258:     true = Server_1 =/= Server_2,
 2259:     stop9212(Top).
 2260: 
 2261: restart_worker() ->
 2262:     {Top, _Sup2, Server_1} = start9212(),
 2263:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child({global, sup2}, child),
 2264:     {ok, _Child} = supervisor:restart_child({global, sup2}, child),
 2265:     Server_2 = global:whereis_name(server),
 2266:     true = is_pid(Server_2),
 2267:     true = Server_1 =/= Server_2,
 2268:     stop9212(Top).
 2269: 
 2270: start9212() ->
 2271:     Middle = {middle,{?MODULE,middle9212,[]}, permanent,2000,supervisor,[]},
 2272:     InitResult = {ok, {{one_for_all,3,60}, [Middle]}},
 2273:     {ok, TopPid} = start_link(InitResult),
 2274: 
 2275:     Sup2 = global:whereis_name(sup2),
 2276:     Server = global:whereis_name(server),
 2277:     true = is_pid(Sup2),
 2278:     true = is_pid(Server),
 2279:     {TopPid, Sup2, Server}.
 2280: 
 2281: stop9212(Top) ->
 2282:     Old = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2283:     exit(Top, kill),
 2284:     timer:sleep(200),
 2285:     undefined = global:whereis_name(sup2),
 2286:     undefined = global:whereis_name(server),
 2287:     check_exit([Top]),
 2288:     _ = process_flag(trap_exit, Old),
 2289:     ok.
 2290: 
 2291: middle9212() ->
 2292:     Child = {child, {?MODULE,gen_server9212,[]},permanent, 2000, worker, []},
 2293:     InitResult = {ok, {{one_for_all,3,60}, [Child]}},
 2294:     supervisor:start_link({global,sup2}, ?MODULE, InitResult).
 2295: 
 2296: gen_server9212() ->
 2297:     InitResult = {ok, []},
 2298:     gen_server:start_link({global,server}, ?MODULE, InitResult, []).
 2299: 
 2300: 
 2301: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2302: %% Test that child and supervisor can be shutdown while hanging in restart loop.
 2303: %% See OTP-9549.
 2304: hanging_restart_loop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2305:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2306:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 8, 10}, []}}),
 2307:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_deadlock, start_child, []},
 2308: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2309: 
 2310:     %% Ets table with state read by supervisor_deadlock.erl
 2311:     ets:new(supervisor_deadlock,[set,named_table,public]),
 2312:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2313: 
 2314:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 2315:     link(CPid1),
 2316: 
 2317:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2318:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(),
 2319:     timer:sleep(2000), % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2320: 
 2321:     {error, already_present} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 2322:     {error, restarting} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
 2323:     {error, restarting} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
 2324:     [{child1,restarting,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2325:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 2326: 
 2327:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child1),
 2328:     check_exit_reason(CPid1, error),
 2329:     [{child1,undefined,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2330: 
 2331:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2332:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
 2333:     link(CPid2),
 2334: 
 2335:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2336:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(),
 2337:     timer:sleep(2000), % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2338: 
 2339:     %% Terminating supervisor.
 2340:     %% OTP-9549 fixes so this does not give a timetrap timeout -
 2341:     %% i.e. that supervisor does not hang in restart loop.
 2342:     terminate(Pid,shutdown),
 2343: 
 2344:     %% Check that child died with reason from 'restart' request above
 2345:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, error),
 2346:     undefined = whereis(sup_test),
 2347:     ok.
 2348: 
 2349: hanging_restart_loop_rest_for_one(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2350:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2351:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{rest_for_one, 8, 10}, []}}),
 2352:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2353: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2354:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_deadlock, start_child, []},
 2355: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2356:     Child3 = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2357: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2358: 
 2359:     %% Ets table with state read by supervisor_deadlock.erl
 2360:     ets:new(supervisor_deadlock,[set,named_table,public]),
 2361:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2362: 
 2363:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child1),
 2364:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 2365:     link(CPid2),
 2366:     {ok, _CPid3} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child3),
 2367: 
 2368:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2369:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(),
 2370:     timer:sleep(2000), % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2371: 
 2372:     {error, already_present} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, Child2),
 2373:     {error, restarting} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child2),
 2374:     {error, restarting} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child2),
 2375:     [{child3,undefined,worker,[]},
 2376:      {child2,restarting,worker,[]},
 2377:      {child1,CPid1,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2378:     [3,1,0,3] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 2379: 
 2380:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, child2),
 2381:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, error),
 2382:     [{child3,undefined,worker,[]},
 2383:      {child2,undefined,worker,[]},
 2384:      {child1,CPid1,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2385: 
 2386:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2387:     {ok, CPid22} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child2),
 2388:     link(CPid22),
 2389: 
 2390:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2391:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(),
 2392:     timer:sleep(2000), % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2393: 
 2394:     %% Terminating supervisor.
 2395:     %% OTP-9549 fixes so this does not give a timetrap timeout -
 2396:     %% i.e. that supervisor does not hang in restart loop.
 2397:     terminate(Pid,shutdown),
 2398: 
 2399:     %% Check that child died with reason from 'restart' request above
 2400:     check_exit_reason(CPid22, error),
 2401:     undefined = whereis(sup_test),
 2402:     ok.
 2403: 
 2404: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2405: %% Test that child and supervisor can be shutdown while hanging in
 2406: %% restart loop, simple_one_for_one.
 2407: %% See OTP-9549.
 2408: hanging_restart_loop_simple(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2409:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2410:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_deadlock, start_child, []},
 2411: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2412:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {{simple_one_for_one, 8, 10}, [Child1]}}),
 2413: 
 2414:     %% Ets table with state read by supervisor_deadlock.erl
 2415:     ets:new(supervisor_deadlock,[set,named_table,public]),
 2416:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2417: 
 2418:     {ok, CPid1} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 2419:     link(CPid1),
 2420: 
 2421:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2422:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(),
 2423:     timer:sleep(2000), % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2424: 
 2425:     {error, simple_one_for_one} = supervisor:restart_child(sup_test, child1),
 2426:     {error, simple_one_for_one} = supervisor:delete_child(sup_test, child1),
 2427:     [{undefined,restarting,worker,[]}] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2428:     [1,0,0,1] = get_child_counts(sup_test),
 2429: 
 2430:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test, CPid1),
 2431:     check_exit_reason(CPid1, error),
 2432:     [] = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2433: 
 2434:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,false}),
 2435:     {ok, CPid2} = supervisor:start_child(sup_test, []),
 2436:     link(CPid2),
 2437: 
 2438:     ets:insert(supervisor_deadlock,{fail_start,true}),
 2439:     supervisor_deadlock:restart_child(),
 2440:     timer:sleep(2000), % allow restart to happen before proceeding
 2441: 
 2442:     %% Terminating supervisor.
 2443:     %% OTP-9549 fixes so this does not give a timetrap timeout -
 2444:     %% i.e. that supervisor does not hang in restart loop.
 2445:     terminate(Pid,shutdown),
 2446: 
 2447:     %% Check that child died with reason from 'restart' request above
 2448:     check_exit_reason(CPid2, error),
 2449:     undefined = whereis(sup_test),
 2450:     ok.
 2451: 
 2452: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2453: %% Test the code_change function
 2454: code_change(_Config) ->
 2455:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2456: 
 2457:     SupFlags = {one_for_one, 0, 1},
 2458:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {SupFlags, []}}),
 2459:     [] = supervisor:which_children(Pid),
 2460: 
 2461:     %% Change supervisor flags
 2462:     S1 = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2463:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {{one_for_one, 1, 3}, []}}),
 2464:     S2 = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2465:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 2466: 
 2467:     %% Faulty childspec
 2468:     FaultyChild = {child1, permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []}, % missing start
 2469:     {error,{error,{invalid_child_spec,FaultyChild}}} =
 2470: 	fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok,{SupFlags,[FaultyChild]}}),
 2471: 
 2472:     %% Add child1 and child2
 2473:     Child1 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2474: 	      permanent, 2000, worker, []},
 2475:     Child2 = {child2, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2476: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2477:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok,{SupFlags,[Child1,Child2]}}),
 2478:     %% Children are not automatically started
 2479:     {ok,_} = supervisor:restart_child(Pid,child1),
 2480:     {ok,_} = supervisor:restart_child(Pid,child2),
 2481:     [{child2,_,_,_},{child1,_,_,_}] = supervisor:which_children(Pid),
 2482: 
 2483:     %% Change child1, remove child2 and add child3
 2484:     Child11 = {child1, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2485: 	      permanent, 1000, worker, []},
 2486:     Child3 = {child3, {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2487: 	      permanent, brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2488:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {SupFlags, [Child11,Child3]}}),
 2489:     %% Children are not deleted on upgrade, so it is ok that child2 is
 2490:     %% still here
 2491:     [{child2,_,_,_},{child3,_,_,_},{child1,_,_,_}] =
 2492: 	supervisor:which_children(Pid),
 2493: 
 2494:     %% Ignore during upgrade
 2495:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,ignore),
 2496: 
 2497:     %% Error during upgrade
 2498:     {error, faulty_return} = fake_upgrade(Pid,faulty_return),
 2499: 
 2500:     %% Faulty flags
 2501:     {error,{error, {invalid_intensity,faulty_intensity}}} =
 2502: 	fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {{one_for_one,faulty_intensity,1}, []}}),
 2503:     {error,{error,{bad_flags, faulty_flags}}} =
 2504: 	fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {faulty_flags, []}}),
 2505: 
 2506:     terminate(Pid,shutdown).
 2507: 
 2508: code_change_map(_Config) ->
 2509:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2510: 
 2511:     {ok, Pid} = start_link({ok, {#{}, []}}),
 2512:     [] = supervisor:which_children(Pid),
 2513: 
 2514:     %% Change supervisor flags
 2515:     S1 = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2516:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {#{intensity=>1, period=>3}, []}}),
 2517:     S2 = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2518:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 2519: 
 2520:     %% Faulty childspec
 2521:     FaultyChild = #{id=>faulty_child},
 2522:     {error,{error,missing_start}} =
 2523: 	fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok,{#{},[FaultyChild]}}),
 2524: 
 2525:     %% Add child1 and child2
 2526:     Child1 = #{id=>child1,
 2527: 	       start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2528: 	       shutdown=>2000},
 2529:     Child2 = #{id=>child2,
 2530: 	       start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
 2531:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok,{#{},[Child1,Child2]}}),
 2532:     %% Children are not automatically started
 2533:     {ok,_} = supervisor:restart_child(Pid,child1),
 2534:     {ok,_} = supervisor:restart_child(Pid,child2),
 2535:     [{child2,_,_,_},{child1,_,_,_}] = supervisor:which_children(Pid),
 2536:     {ok,#{shutdown:=2000}} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid,child1),
 2537: 
 2538:     %% Change child1, remove child2 and add child3
 2539:     Child11 = #{id=>child1,
 2540: 		start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2541: 		shutdown=>1000},
 2542:     Child3 = #{id=>child3,
 2543: 	       start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
 2544:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {#{}, [Child11,Child3]}}),
 2545:     %% Children are not deleted on upgrade, so it is ok that child2 is
 2546:     %% still here
 2547:     [{child2,_,_,_},{child3,_,_,_},{child1,_,_,_}] =
 2548: 	supervisor:which_children(Pid),
 2549:     {ok,#{shutdown:=1000}} = supervisor:get_childspec(Pid,child1),
 2550: 
 2551:     %% Ignore during upgrade
 2552:     ok = fake_upgrade(Pid,ignore),
 2553: 
 2554:     %% Error during upgrade
 2555:     {error, faulty_return} = fake_upgrade(Pid,faulty_return),
 2556: 
 2557:     %% Faulty flags
 2558:     {error,{error, {invalid_intensity,faulty_intensity}}} =
 2559: 	fake_upgrade(Pid,{ok, {#{intensity=>faulty_intensity}, []}}),
 2560: 
 2561:     terminate(Pid,shutdown).
 2562: 
 2563: code_change_simple(_Config) ->
 2564:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2565: 
 2566:     SimpleChild1 = {child1,{supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
 2567: 		    brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2568:     SimpleFlags = {simple_one_for_one, 0, 1},
 2569:     {ok, SimplePid}  = start_link({ok, {SimpleFlags,[SimpleChild1]}}),
 2570:     %% Change childspec
 2571:     SimpleChild11 = {child1,{supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
 2572: 		    1000, worker, []},
 2573:     ok = fake_upgrade(SimplePid,{ok,{SimpleFlags,[SimpleChild11]}}),
 2574: 
 2575:     %% Attempt to add child
 2576:     SimpleChild2 = {child2,{supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent,
 2577: 		    brutal_kill, worker, []},
 2578: 
 2579:     {error, {error, {ok,{[_,_],_}}}} =
 2580: 	fake_upgrade(SimplePid,{ok,{SimpleFlags,[SimpleChild1,SimpleChild2]}}),
 2581: 
 2582:     %% Attempt to remove child
 2583:     {error, {error, {ok,{[],_}}}} = fake_upgrade(SimplePid,{ok,{SimpleFlags,[]}}),
 2584: 
 2585:     terminate(SimplePid,shutdown),
 2586:     ok.
 2587: 
 2588: code_change_simple_map(_Config) ->
 2589:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2590: 
 2591:     SimpleChild1 = #{id=>child1,
 2592: 		     start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
 2593:     SimpleFlags = #{strategy=>simple_one_for_one},
 2594:     {ok, SimplePid}  = start_link({ok, {SimpleFlags,[SimpleChild1]}}),
 2595:     %% Change childspec
 2596:     SimpleChild11 = #{id=>child1,
 2597: 		      start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 2598: 		      shutdown=>1000},
 2599:     ok = fake_upgrade(SimplePid,{ok,{SimpleFlags,[SimpleChild11]}}),
 2600: 
 2601:     %% Attempt to add child
 2602:     SimpleChild2 = #{id=>child2,
 2603: 		     start=>{supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
 2604:     {error, {error, {ok, {[_,_],_}}}} =
 2605: 	fake_upgrade(SimplePid,{ok,{SimpleFlags,[SimpleChild1,SimpleChild2]}}),
 2606: 
 2607:     %% Attempt to remove child
 2608:     {error, {error, {ok, {[],_}}}} =
 2609: 	fake_upgrade(SimplePid,{ok,{SimpleFlags,[]}}),
 2610: 
 2611:     terminate(SimplePid,shutdown),
 2612:     ok.
 2613: 
 2614: fake_upgrade(Pid,NewInitReturn) ->
 2615:     ok = sys:suspend(Pid),
 2616: 
 2617:     %% Update state to fake code change
 2618:     %% The #state record in supervisor.erl holds the arguments given
 2619:     %% to the callback init function. By replacing these arguments the
 2620:     %% init function will return something new and by that fake a code
 2621:     %% change (see init function above in this module).
 2622:     Fun = fun(State) ->
 2623: 		  Size = size(State), % 'args' is the last field in #state.
 2624: 		  setelement(Size,State,NewInitReturn)
 2625: 	  end,
 2626:     sys:replace_state(Pid,Fun),
 2627: 
 2628:     R = sys:change_code(Pid,gen_server,dummy_vsn,[]),
 2629:     ok = sys:resume(Pid),
 2630:     R.
 2631: 
 2632: %% Test that children are started in the order they are given, and
 2633: %% terminated in the opposite order
 2634: order_of_children(_Config) ->
 2635:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2636:     %% Use child ids that are not alphabetically storted
 2637:     Id1 = ch7,
 2638:     Id2 = ch3,
 2639:     Id3 = ch10,
 2640:     Id4 = ch2,
 2641:     Id5 = ch5,
 2642:     Children =
 2643:         [{Id, {supervisor_1, start_child, []}, permanent, 1000, worker, []} ||
 2644:             Id <- [Id1,Id2,Id3,Id4,Id5]],
 2645: 
 2646:     {ok, SupPid}  = start_link({ok, {{rest_for_one, 2, 3600}, Children}}),
 2647: 
 2648: 
 2649:     %% Check start order (pids are growing)
 2650:     Which1 = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2651:     IsPid = fun({_,P,_,_}) when is_pid(P) -> true; (_) -> false end,
 2652:     true = lists:all(IsPid,Which1),
 2653:     SortedOnPid1 = lists:keysort(2,Which1),
 2654:     [{Id1,Pid1,_,_},
 2655:      {Id2,Pid2,_,_},
 2656:      {Id3,Pid3,_,_},
 2657:      {Id4,Pid4,_,_},
 2658:      {Id5,Pid5,_,_}] = SortedOnPid1,
 2659: 
 2660:     TPid = self(),
 2661:     TraceHandler = fun({trace,P,exit,_},{Last,Ps}) when P=:=Last ->
 2662:                            TPid ! {exited,lists:reverse([P|Ps])},
 2663:                            {Last,Ps};
 2664:                       ({trace,P,exit,_},{Last,Ps}) ->
 2665:                            {Last,[P|Ps]};
 2666:                       (_T,Acc) ->
 2667:                            Acc
 2668:                    end,
 2669: 
 2670:     %% Terminate Pid3 and check that Pid4 and Pid5 are terminated in
 2671:     %% expected order.
 2672:     Expected1 = [Pid5,Pid4],
 2673:     {ok,_} = dbg:tracer(process,{TraceHandler,{Pid4,[]}}),
 2674:     [{ok,[_]} = dbg:p(P,procs) || P <- Expected1],
 2675:     terminate(Pid3, abnormal),
 2676:     receive {exited,ExitedPids1} ->
 2677:             dbg:stop(),
 2678:             case ExitedPids1 of
 2679:                 Expected1 -> ok;
 2680:                 _ -> ct:fail({faulty_termination_order,
 2681:                               {expected,Expected1},
 2682:                               {got,ExitedPids1}})
 2683:             end
 2684:     after 3000 ->
 2685:             dbg:stop(),
 2686:             ct:fail({shutdown_fail,timeout})
 2687:     end,
 2688: 
 2689:     %% Then check that Id3-5 are started again in correct order
 2690:     Which2 = supervisor:which_children(sup_test),
 2691:     true = lists:all(IsPid,Which2),
 2692:     SortedOnPid2 = lists:keysort(2,Which2),
 2693:     [{Id1,Pid1,_,_},
 2694:      {Id2,Pid2,_,_},
 2695:      {Id3,Pid32,_,_},
 2696:      {Id4,Pid42,_,_},
 2697:      {Id5,Pid52,_,_}] = SortedOnPid2,
 2698: 
 2699:     %% Terminate supervisor and check that all children are terminated
 2700:     %% in opposite start order
 2701:     Expected2 = [Pid52,Pid42,Pid32,Pid2,Pid1],
 2702:     {ok,_} = dbg:tracer(process,{TraceHandler,{Pid1,[]}}),
 2703:     [{ok,[_]} = dbg:p(P,procs) || P <- Expected2],
 2704:     exit(SupPid,shutdown),
 2705:     receive {exited,ExitedPids2} ->
 2706:             dbg:stop(),
 2707:             case ExitedPids2 of
 2708:                 Expected2 -> ok;
 2709:                 _ -> ct:fail({faulty_termination_order,
 2710:                               {expected,Expected2},
 2711:                               {got,ExitedPids2}})
 2712:             end
 2713:     after 3000 ->
 2714:             dbg:stop(),
 2715:             ct:fail({shutdown_fail,timeout})
 2716:     end,
 2717:     ok.
 2718: 
 2719: %% Test that a non-simple supervisor scales well for starting and
 2720: %% stopping many children.
 2721: scale_start_stop_many_children(_Config) ->
 2722:     case erlang:system_info(build_type) of
 2723:         opt -> scale_start_stop_many_children();
 2724:         Other -> {skip,"Run on build type 'opt' only (current: '" ++
 2725:                       atom_to_list(Other)++"')"}
 2726:     end.
 2727: 
 2728: scale_start_stop_many_children() ->
 2729:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2730:     {ok, _Pid}  = start_link({ok, {{one_for_one, 2, 3600}, []}}),
 2731:     N1 = 1000,
 2732:     N2 = 100000,
 2733:     Ids1 = lists:seq(1,N1),
 2734:     Ids2 = lists:seq(1,N2),
 2735:     Children1 = [{Id,{supervisor_1,start_child,[]},permanent,1000,worker,[]} ||
 2736:                     Id <- Ids1],
 2737:     Children2 = [{Id,{supervisor_1,start_child,[]},permanent,1000,worker,[]} ||
 2738:                     Id <- Ids2],
 2739: 
 2740:     {StartT1,_} =
 2741:         timer:tc(fun() ->
 2742:                          [supervisor:start_child(sup_test,C) || C <- Children1]
 2743:                  end),
 2744:     {StopT1,_} =
 2745:         timer:tc(fun() ->
 2746:                          [supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test,I) || I <- Ids1]
 2747:                  end),
 2748:     ct:log("~w children, start time: ~w ms, stop time: ~w ms",
 2749:            [N1, StartT1 div 1000, StopT1 div 1000]),
 2750: 
 2751:     {StartT2,_} =
 2752:         timer:tc(fun() ->
 2753:                          [supervisor:start_child(sup_test,C) || C <- Children2]
 2754:                  end),
 2755:     {StopT2,_} =
 2756:         timer:tc(fun() ->
 2757:                          [supervisor:terminate_child(sup_test,I) || I <- Ids2]
 2758:                  end),
 2759:     ct:log("~w children, start time: ~w ms, stop time: ~w ms",
 2760:            [N2, StartT2 div 1000, StopT2 div 1000]),
 2761: 
 2762:     TimerAdjustment =
 2763:         case os:type() of
 2764:             {win32,_} ->
 2765:                 %% Windows timer unit is really bad...
 2766:                 16000;
 2767:             _ ->
 2768:                 %% To avoid div by zero
 2769:                 1
 2770:         end,
 2771: 
 2772:     %% Scaling should be more or less linear, but allowing a bit more
 2773:     %% to avoid false alarms (add 1 to avoid div zero)
 2774:     ScaleLimit = (N2 div N1) * 10,
 2775:     StartScale = StartT2 div (StartT1+TimerAdjustment),
 2776:     StopScale = StopT2 div (StopT1+TimerAdjustment),
 2777: 
 2778:     ct:log("Scale limit: ~w~nStart scale: ~w~nStop scale: ~w",
 2779:            [ScaleLimit, StartScale, StopScale]),
 2780: 
 2781:     if StartScale > ScaleLimit ->
 2782:             ct:fail({bad_start_scale,StartScale});
 2783:        StopScale > ScaleLimit ->
 2784:             ct:fail({bad_stop_scale,StopScale});
 2785:        true ->
 2786:             ok
 2787:     end,
 2788: 
 2789:     ok.
 2790: 
 2791: %% Test report callback for Logger handler error_logger
 2792: format_log_1(_Config) ->
 2793:     FD = application:get_env(kernel, error_logger_format_depth),
 2794:     application:unset_env(kernel, error_logger_format_depth),
 2795:     Term = lists:seq(1, 15),
 2796:     Supervisor = my_supervisor,
 2797:     Name = self(),
 2798:     Error = shutdown_error,
 2799:     Child = [{pid,Name},{id,any_id},
 2800:              {mfargs,{mod,func,[any,Term]}},
 2801:              {restart_type,temporary},
 2802:              {shutdown,brutal_kill},
 2803:              {child_type,worker}],
 2804:     Report = #{label=>{supervisor,Error},
 2805:                report=>[{supervisor,Supervisor},
 2806:                         {errorContext,Error},
 2807:                         {reason,Term},
 2808:                         {offender,Child}]},
 2809:     {F1, A1} = supervisor:format_log(Report),
 2810:     FExpected1 = "    supervisor: ~tp~n"
 2811:         "    errorContext: ~tp~n"
 2812:         "    reason: ~tp~n"
 2813:         "    offender: ~tp~n",
 2814:     ct:log("F1: ~ts~nA1: ~tp", [F1,A1]),
 2815:     FExpected1 = F1,
 2816:     [Supervisor,Error,Term,Child] = A1,
 2817: 
 2818:     Progress = #{label=>{supervisor,progress},
 2819:                  report=>[{supervisor,Supervisor},{started,Child}]},
 2820:     {PF1,PA1} = supervisor:format_log(Progress),
 2821:     PFExpected1 = "    supervisor: ~tp~n    started: ~tp~n",
 2822:     ct:log("PF1: ~ts~nPA1: ~tp", [PF1,PA1]),
 2823:     PFExpected1 = PF1,
 2824:     [Supervisor,Child] = PA1,
 2825: 
 2826:     Depth = 10,
 2827:     ok = application:set_env(kernel, error_logger_format_depth, Depth),
 2828:     Limited = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,'...'],
 2829:     {F2,A2} = supervisor:format_log(Report),
 2830:     FExpected2 = "    supervisor: ~tP~n"
 2831:         "    errorContext: ~tP~n"
 2832:         "    reason: ~tP~n"
 2833:         "    offender: ~tP~n",
 2834:     ct:log("F2: ~ts~nA2: ~tp", [F2,A2]),
 2835:     FExpected2 = F2,
 2836:     Limited = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,'...'],
 2837:     LimitedChild = [{pid,Name},{id,any_id},
 2838:                     {mfargs,{mod,func,[any,'...']}},
 2839:                     {restart_type,temporary},
 2840:                     {shutdown,brutal_kill},
 2841:                     {child_type,worker}],
 2842: 
 2843:     [Supervisor,Depth,Error,Depth,Limited,Depth,LimitedChild,Depth] = A2,
 2844: 
 2845:     {PF2,PA2} = supervisor:format_log(Progress),
 2846:     PFExpected2 = "    supervisor: ~tP~n    started: ~tP~n",
 2847:     ct:log("PF2: ~ts~nPA2: ~tp", [PF2,PA2]),
 2848:     PFExpected2 = PF2,
 2849:     [Supervisor,Depth,LimitedChild,Depth] = PA2,
 2850: 
 2851:     case FD of
 2852:         undefined ->
 2853:             application:unset_env(kernel, error_logger_format_depth);
 2854:         _ ->
 2855:             application:set_env(kernel, error_logger_format_depth, FD)
 2856:     end,
 2857:     ok.
 2858: 
 2859: %% Test report callback for any Logger handler
 2860: format_log_2(_Config) ->
 2861:     Term = lists:seq(1, 15),
 2862:     Supervisor = my_supervisor,

 2864:     NameStr = pid_to_list(Name),
