 3030: 
 3031: flatten_format_log(Report, Format) ->
 3032:     lists:flatten(supervisor:format_log(Report, Format)).
 3033: 
 3034: % Test that terminations of temporary non-significant children do not
 3035: % trigger auto-shutdown regardless of the supervisor's auto_shutdown
 3036: % mode.
 3037: nonsignificant_temporary(_Config) ->
 3038:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3039:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3040: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3041: 	       restart => temporary,
 3042: 	       significant => false},
 3043: 
 3044:     lists:foreach(
 3045: 	fun (AutoShutdown) ->
 3046: 	    {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => AutoShutdown}, []}}),
 3047: 
 3048: 	    % Terminating a temporary non-significant child via the supervisor
 3049: 	    % should not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3050: 	    {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3051: 	    link(ChildPid1),
 3052: 	    terminate(Sup1, ChildPid1, child1, supervisor),
 3053: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3054: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3055: 
 3056: 	    % Killing a temporary non-significant child should not trigger
 3057: 	    % auto-shutdown.
 3058: 	    {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3059: 	    link(ChildPid2),
 3060: 	    terminate(ChildPid2, kill),
 3061: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid2]),
 3062: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3063: 
 3064: 	    % Abnormal termination of a temporary non-significant child
 3065: 	    % should not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3066: 	    {ok, ChildPid3} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3067: 	    link(ChildPid3),
 3068: 	    terminate(ChildPid3, abnormal),
 3069: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid3]),
 3070: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3071: 
 3072: 	    % Normal termination of a temporary non-significant child
 3073: 	    % should not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3074: 	    {ok, ChildPid4} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3075: 	    link(ChildPid4),
 3076: 	    terminate(ChildPid4, normal),
 3077: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid4]),
 3078: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3079: 
 3080: 	    terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3081: 	    ok = check_exit([Sup1])
 3082: 	end,
 3083: 	[never, any_significant, all_significant]),
 3084: 
 3085:     ok.
 3086: 
 3087: % Test that terminations of transient non-significant children do not
 3088: % trigger auto-shutdown regardless of the supervisor's auto_shutdown
 3089: % mode.
 3090: nonsignificant_transient(_Config) ->
 3091:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3092:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3093: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3094: 	       restart => transient,
 3095: 	       significant => false},
 3096: 
 3097:     lists:foreach(
 3098: 	fun (AutoShutdown) ->
 3099: 	    {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3100: 					    auto_shutdown => AutoShutdown}, []}}),
 3101: 
 3102: 	    % Terminating a transient non-significant child via the supervisor
 3103: 	    % should not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3104: 	    {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3105: 	    link(ChildPid1),
 3106: 	    terminate(Sup1, ChildPid1, child1, supervisor),
 3107: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3108: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3109: 
 3110: 	    % Killing a transient non-significant child should not trigger
 3111: 	    % auto-shutdown. The killed child should be restarted.
 3112: 	    {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3113: 	    link(ChildPid2),
 3114: 	    terminate(ChildPid2, kill),
 3115: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid2]),
 3116: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3117: 
 3118: 	    % Abnormal termination of a transient non-significant child should
 3119: 	    % not trigger auto-shutdown. The terminated child should be restarted.
 3120: 	    [{child1, ChildPid3, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3121: 	    link(ChildPid3),
 3122: 	    terminate(ChildPid3, abnormal),
 3123: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid3]),
 3124: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3125: 
 3126: 	    % Normal termination of a transient non-significant child should not
 3127: 	    % trigger  auto-shutdown.
 3128: 	    [{child1, ChildPid4, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3129: 	    link(ChildPid4),
 3130: 	    terminate(ChildPid4, normal),
 3131: 	    ok = check_exit([ChildPid4]),
 3132: 	    error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3133: 
 3134: 	    terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3135: 	    ok = check_exit([Sup1])
 3136: 	end,
 3137: 	[never, any_significant, all_significant]),
 3138: 
 3139:     ok.
 3140: 
 3141: % Test the auto-shutdown feature with temporary significant children.
 3142: significant_temporary(_Config) ->
 3143:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3144:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3145: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3146: 	       restart => temporary,
 3147: 	       significant => true},
 3148:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3149: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3150: 	       restart => temporary,
 3151: 	       significant => true},
 3152:     Child3 = #{id => child3,
 3153: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3154: 	       restart => temporary,
 3155: 	       significant => false},
 3156: 
 3157:     % Test auto-shutdown on the exit of any significant child.
 3158: 
 3159:     % Terminating a temporary significant child via the supervisor should not
 3160:     % trigger auto-shutdown.
 3161:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3162: 				    auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3163:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3164:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3165:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child3),
 3166:     [{child3, ChildPid1_3, _, _},
 3167:      {child2, ChildPid1_2, _, _},
 3168:      {child1, ChildPid1_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3169:     link(ChildPid1_1),
 3170:     link(ChildPid1_2),
 3171:     link(ChildPid1_3),
 3172:     terminate(Sup1, ChildPid1_1, child1, supervisor),
 3173:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1_1]),
 3174:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1_2], 1000),
 3175:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1_3], 1000),
 3176:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3177: 
 3178:     % Killing a temporary significant child should trigger auto-shutdown.
 3179:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3180:     [{child1, ChildPid2_1, _, _},
 3181:      {child3, ChildPid2_3, _, _},
 3182:      {child2, ChildPid2_2, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3183:     link(ChildPid2_1),
 3184:     link(ChildPid2_2),
 3185:     link(ChildPid2_3),
 3186:     terminate(ChildPid2_1, kill),
 3187:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2_1, ChildPid2_2, ChildPid2_3, Sup1]),
 3188: 
 3189:     % Abnormal termination of a temporary significant child should trigger
 3190:     % auto-shutdown.
 3191:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3192: 				    auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3193:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child1),
 3194:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child2),
 3195:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child3),
 3196:     [{child3, ChildPid3_3, _, _},
 3197:      {child2, ChildPid3_2, _, _},
 3198:      {child1, ChildPid3_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup2),
 3199:     link(ChildPid3_1),
 3200:     link(ChildPid3_2),
 3201:     link(ChildPid3_3),
 3202:     terminate(ChildPid3_1, abnormal),
 3203:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid3_1, ChildPid3_2, ChildPid3_3, Sup2]),
 3204: 
 3205:     % Normal termination of a temporary significant child should trigger
 3206:     % auto-shutdown.
 3207:     {ok, Sup3} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3208: 				    auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3209:     supervisor:start_child(Sup3, Child1),
 3210:     supervisor:start_child(Sup3, Child2),
 3211:     supervisor:start_child(Sup3, Child3),
 3212:     [{child3, ChildPid4_3, _, _},
 3213:      {child2, ChildPid4_2, _, _},
 3214:      {child1, ChildPid4_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup3),
 3215:     link(ChildPid4_1),
 3216:     link(ChildPid4_2),
 3217:     link(ChildPid4_3),
 3218:     terminate(ChildPid4_1, normal),
 3219:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid4_1, ChildPid4_2, ChildPid4_3, Sup3]),
 3220: 
 3221:     % Test auto-shutdown on the exit of all significant children.
 3222: 
 3223:     {ok, Sup4} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3224: 				    auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3225: 
 3226:     % The termination of only one of the two significant children should
 3227:     % not trigger auto-shutdown. The termination of the second (last of the two)
 3228:     % significant child should trigger auto-shutdown.
 3229:     supervisor:start_child(Sup4, Child1),
 3230:     supervisor:start_child(Sup4, Child2),
 3231:     supervisor:start_child(Sup4, Child3),
 3232:     [{child3, ChildPid5_3, _, _},
 3233:      {child2, ChildPid5_2, _, _},
 3234:      {child1, ChildPid5_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup4),
 3235:     link(ChildPid5_1),
 3236:     link(ChildPid5_2),
 3237:     link(ChildPid5_3),
 3238:     terminate(ChildPid5_1, normal),
 3239:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid5_1]),
 3240:     error = check_exit([ChildPid5_2], 1000),
 3241:     error = check_exit([ChildPid5_3], 1000),
 3242:     error = check_exit([Sup4], 1000),
 3243:     terminate(ChildPid5_2, normal),
 3244:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid5_2, ChildPid5_3, Sup4]),
 3245: 
 3246:     ok.
 3247: 
 3248: % Test the auto-shutdown feature with transient significant children.
 3249: significant_transient(_Config) ->
 3250:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3251:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3252:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3253:                restart => transient,
 3254:                significant => true},
 3255:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3256:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3257:                restart => transient,
 3258:                significant => true},
 3259:     Child3 = #{id => child3,
 3260:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3261:                restart => transient,
 3262:                significant => false},
 3263: 
 3264:     % Test auto-shutdown on the exit of any significant child.
 3265: 
 3266:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3267: 				    auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3268: 
 3269:     % Terminating a transient significant child via the supervisor should not
 3270:     % trigger auto-shutdown.
 3271:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3272:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3273:     supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child3),
 3274:     [{child3, ChildPid1_3, _, _},
 3275:      {child2, ChildPid1_2, _, _},
 3276:      {child1, ChildPid1_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3277:     link(ChildPid1_1),
 3278:     link(ChildPid1_2),
 3279:     link(ChildPid1_3),
 3280:     terminate(Sup1, ChildPid1_1, child1, supervisor),
 3281:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1_1]),
 3282:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1_2], 1000),
 3283:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1_3], 1000),
 3284:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3285:     supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3286: 
 3287:     % Killing a transient significant child should not trigger
 3288:     % auto-shutdown. The killed child should be restarted.
 3289:     [{child3, ChildPid2_3, _, _},
 3290:      {child2, ChildPid2_2, _, _},
 3291:      {child1, ChildPid2_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3292:     link(ChildPid2_1),
 3293:     link(ChildPid2_2),
 3294:     link(ChildPid2_3),
 3295:     terminate(ChildPid2_1, kill),
 3296:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2_1]),
 3297:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2_2], 1000),
 3298:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2_3], 1000),
 3299:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3300: 
 3301:     % Abnormal termination of a transient significant child should not trigger
 3302:     % auto-shutdown. The terminated child should be restarted.
 3303:     [{child3, ChildPid3_3, _, _},
 3304:      {child2, ChildPid3_2, _, _},
 3305:      {child1, ChildPid3_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3306:     link(ChildPid3_1),
 3307:     link(ChildPid3_2),
 3308:     link(ChildPid3_3),
 3309:     terminate(ChildPid3_1, abnormal),
 3310:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid3_1]),
 3311:     error = check_exit([ChildPid3_2], 1000),
 3312:     error = check_exit([ChildPid3_3], 1000),
 3313:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3314: 
 3315:     % Normal termination of a transient significant child should trigger
 3316:     % auto-shutdown.
 3317:     [{child3, ChildPid4_3, _, _},
 3318:      {child2, ChildPid4_2, _, _},
 3319:      {child1, ChildPid4_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3320:     link(ChildPid4_1),
 3321:     link(ChildPid4_2),
 3322:     link(ChildPid4_3),
 3323:     terminate(ChildPid4_1, normal),
 3324:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid4_1, ChildPid4_2, ChildPid4_3, Sup1]),
 3325: 
 3326:     % Test auto-shutdown on the exit of all significant children.
 3327: 
 3328:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{intensity => 5,
 3329: 				    auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3330: 
 3331:     % The termination of only one of the two significant children should
 3332:     % not trigger auto-shutdown. The termination of the second (last of the two)
 3333:     % significant child should trigger auto-shutdown.
 3334:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child1),
 3335:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child2),
 3336:     supervisor:start_child(Sup2, Child3),
 3337:     [{child3, ChildPid5_3, _, _},
 3338:      {child2, ChildPid5_2, _, _},
 3339:      {child1, ChildPid5_1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup2),
 3340:     link(ChildPid5_1),
 3341:     link(ChildPid5_2),
 3342:     link(ChildPid5_3),
 3343:     terminate(ChildPid5_1, normal),
 3344:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid5_1]),
 3345:     error = check_exit([ChildPid5_2], 1000),
 3346:     error = check_exit([ChildPid5_3], 1000),
 3347:     error = check_exit([Sup2], 1000),
 3348:     terminate(ChildPid5_2, normal),
 3349:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid5_2, ChildPid5_3, Sup2]),
 3350: 
 3351:     ok.
 3352: 
 3353: % The auto-shutdown feature is not allowed with simple_one_for_one supervisors.
 3354: significant_simple(_Config) ->
 3355:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3356:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3357: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []}},
 3358: 
 3359:     {error, {supervisor_data, {bad_combination, _}}} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => simple_one_for_one,
 3360:                                                                           auto_shutdown => any_significant},
 3361:                                                                         [Child1]}}),
 3362: 
 3363:     {error, {supervisor_data, {bad_combination, _}}} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => simple_one_for_one,
 3364:                                                                           auto_shutdown => all_significant},
 3365:                                                                         [Child1]}}),
 3366: 
 3367:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => simple_one_for_one,
 3368:                                       auto_shutdown => never},
 3369:                                     [Child1]}}),
 3370:     terminate(SupPid, shutdown),
 3371:     check_exit([SupPid]).
 3372: 
 3373: % Test that terminations of significant children caused by
 3374: % the death of a sibling does not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3375: significant_bystander(_Config) ->
 3376:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3377:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3378:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3379:                restart => transient,
 3380:                significant => true},
 3381:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3382:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3383:                restart => transient,
 3384:                significant => false},
 3385:     Child3 = #{id => child3,
 3386:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3387:                restart => transient,
 3388:                significant => true},
 3389: 
 3390:     lists:foreach(
 3391:         fun ({Strategy, AutoShutdown}) ->
 3392:             {ok, Sup} = start_link({ok, {#{strategy => Strategy,
 3393:                                            intensity => 5,
 3394:                                            auto_shutdown => AutoShutdown}, []}}),
 3395:             supervisor:start_child(Sup, Child1),
 3396:             supervisor:start_child(Sup, Child2),
 3397:             supervisor:start_child(Sup, Child3),
 3398:             [{child3, ChildPid3, _, _},
 3399:              {child2, ChildPid2, _, _},
 3400:              {child1, ChildPid1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup),
 3401:             link(ChildPid1),
 3402:             link(ChildPid2),
 3403:             link(ChildPid3),
 3404:             terminate(ChildPid2, kill),
 3405:             _ = case Strategy of
 3406: 		one_for_one ->
 3407: 		    ok = check_exit([ChildPid2]),
 3408: 		    error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3409: 		    error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000);
 3410:                 one_for_all ->
 3411:                     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildPid2, ChildPid3]);
 3412:                 rest_for_one ->
 3413:                     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, ChildPid3]),
 3414:                     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000)
 3415:             end,
 3416:             error = check_exit([Sup], 1000),
 3417:             terminate(Sup, shutdown),
 3418:             ok = check_exit([Sup])
 3419:         end,
 3420:         [
 3421:             {Strategy, AutoShutdown}
 3422:             ||
 3423:                 Strategy <- [one_for_one, one_for_all, rest_for_one],
 3424:                 AutoShutdown <- [any_significant, all_significant]
 3425:         ]
 3426:     ),
 3427: 
 3428:     ok.
 3429: 
 3430: % Test auto-shutdown escalation. 
 3431: significant_escalation(_Config) ->
 3432:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3433:     ChildSup1 = #{id => sup1,
 3434: 		  start => {supervisor,
 3435: 			    start_link,
 3436: 			    [?MODULE, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}]},
 3437: 		  restart => transient,
 3438:                   type => supervisor},
 3439:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3440:                start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3441:                restart => transient,
 3442:                significant => true},
 3443: 
 3444:     % Supervisor A has another supervisor B as a significant child, and supervisor B
 3445:     % has a worker C as a significant child. A and B have auto-shutdown enabled.
 3446:     % When C terminates, it should cause the auto-shutdown of B, and the termination
 3447:     % of B should in turn cause the auto-shutdown of A.
 3448:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3449:     {ok, ChildSupPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, ChildSup1#{significant => true}),
 3450:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(ChildSupPid1, Child1),
 3451:     link(ChildSupPid1),
 3452:     link(ChildPid1),
 3453:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3454:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildSupPid1, Sup1]),
 3455: 
 3456:     % Supervisor A has another supervisor B as a non-significant child, and supervisor B
 3457:     % has a worker C as a significant child. A and B have auto-shutdown enabled.
 3458:     % When C terminates, it should cause the auto-shutdown of B, but the termination
 3459:     % of B should not in turn cause the auto-shutdown of A.
 3460:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3461:     {ok, ChildSupPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup2, ChildSup1#{significant => false}),
 3462:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(ChildSupPid2, Child1),
 3463:     link(ChildSupPid2),
 3464:     link(ChildPid2),
 3465:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3466:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, ChildSupPid2]),
 3467:     error = check_exit([Sup2], 1000),
 3468:     terminate(Sup2, shutdown),
 3469:     ok = check_exit([Sup2]),
 3470: 
 3471:     ok.
 3472: 
 3473: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from never to any_significant.
 3474: significant_upgrade_never_any(_Config) ->
 3475:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3476:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3477: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3478: 	       restart => transient,
 3479: 	       significant => true},
 3480:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3481: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3482: 	       restart => transient,
 3483: 	       significant => true},
 3484:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, []}}),
 3485:     {error, {bad_combination, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3486:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3487:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3488:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3489:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3490:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3491:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3492:     link(ChildPid1),
 3493:     link(ChildPid2),
 3494:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3495:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3496:     ok.
 3497: 
 3498: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from any_significant to never.
 3499: significant_upgrade_any_never(_Config) ->
 3500:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3501:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3502: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3503: 	       restart => transient,
 3504: 	       significant => true},
 3505:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3506: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3507: 	       restart => transient,
 3508: 	       significant => true},
 3509:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3510:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3511:     link(ChildPid1),
 3512:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3513:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, []}}),
 3514:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3515:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3516:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3517:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3518:     {error, {bad_combination, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3519:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3520:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3521:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3522:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3523:     link(ChildPid2),
 3524:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3525:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3526:     ok.
 3527: 
 3528: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from never to all_significant.
 3529: significant_upgrade_never_all(_Config) ->
 3530:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3531:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3532: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3533: 	       restart => transient,
 3534: 	       significant => true},
 3535:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3536: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3537: 	       restart => transient,
 3538: 	       significant => true},
 3539:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, []}}),
 3540:     {error, {bad_combination, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3541:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3542:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3543:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3544:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3545:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3546:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3547:     link(ChildPid1),
 3548:     link(ChildPid2),
 3549:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3550:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3551:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3552:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3553:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3554:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3555:     ok.
 3556: 
 3557: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from all_significant to never.
 3558: significant_upgrade_all_never(_Config) ->
 3559:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3560:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3561: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3562: 	       restart => transient,
 3563: 	       significant => true},
 3564:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3565: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3566: 	       restart => transient,
 3567: 	       significant => true},
 3568:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3569:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3570:     link(ChildPid1),
 3571:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3572:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, []}}),
 3573:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3574:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3575:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3576:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3577:     {error, {bad_combination, _}} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3578:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3579:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3580:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3581:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3582:     link(ChildPid2),
 3583:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3584:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3585:     ok.
 3586: 
 3587: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from any_significant to all_significant.
 3588: significant_upgrade_any_all(_Config) ->
 3589:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3590:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3591: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3592: 	       restart => transient,
 3593: 	       significant => true},
 3594:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3595: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3596: 	       restart => transient,
 3597: 	       significant => true},
 3598:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3599:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3600:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3601:     link(ChildPid1),
 3602:     link(ChildPid2),
 3603:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3604:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3605:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3606:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3607:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3608:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3609:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3610:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3611:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3612:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3613:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3614:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3615:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3616:     ok.
 3617: 
 3618: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from all_significant to any_significant.
 3619: significant_upgrade_all_any(_Config) ->
 3620:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3621:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3622: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3623: 	       restart => transient,
 3624: 	       significant => true},
 3625:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3626: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3627: 	       restart => transient,
 3628: 	       significant => true},
 3629:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3630:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3631:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3632:     link(ChildPid1),
 3633:     link(ChildPid2),
 3634:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3635:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3636:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3637:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3638:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3639:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3640:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3641:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3642:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3643:     ok.
 3644: 
 3645: % Test upgrading a child from non-significant to significant
 3646: % and vice versa.
 3647: significant_upgrade_child(_Config) ->
 3648:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3649:     Child1 = #{id => child,
 3650: 	      start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3651: 	      restart => transient,
 3652: 	      significant => false},
 3653:     Child2 = #{id => child,
 3654: 	      start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3655: 	      restart => transient,
 3656: 	      significant => true},
 3657: 
 3658:     % A supervisor with auto-shutdown set to never should not allow upgrading
 3659:     % a non-significant child to significant.
 3660:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, [Child1]}}),
 3661:     [{child, ChildPid1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3662:     link(ChildPid1),
 3663:     S1_1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3664:     {error, _} = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, [Child2]}}),
 3665:     S1_2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3666:     true = (S1_1 /= S1_2),
 3667:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3668:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3669:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3670:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, Sup1]),
 3671: 
 3672:     % Start with a non-significant child, upgrade it to significant
 3673:     % and ensure that it triggers auto-shutdown.
 3674:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child1]}}),
 3675:     [{child, ChildPid2, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup2),
 3676:     link(ChildPid2),
 3677:     S2_1 = sys:get_state(Sup2),
 3678:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup2, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child2]}}),
 3679:     S2_2 = sys:get_state(Sup2),
 3680:     true = (S2_1 /= S2_2),
 3681:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3682:     error = check_exit([Sup2], 1000),
 3683:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3684:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup2]),
 3685: 
 3686:     % Start with a significant child, upgrade it to non-significant
 3687:     % and ensure that it does not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3688:     {ok, Sup3} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child2]}}),
 3689:     [{child, ChildPid3, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup3),
 3690:     link(ChildPid3),
 3691:     S3_1 = sys:get_state(Sup3),
 3692:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup3, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child1]}}),
 3693:     S3_2 = sys:get_state(Sup3),
 3694:     true = (S3_1 /= S3_2),
 3695:     error = check_exit([ChildPid3], 1000),
 3696:     error = check_exit([Sup3], 1000),
 3697:     terminate(ChildPid3, normal),
 3698:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid3]),
 3699:     error = check_exit([Sup3], 1000),
 3700:     terminate(Sup3, shutdown),
 3701:     ok = check_exit([Sup3]),
 3702: 
 3703:     ok.
 3704: 
 3705: %% Test trying to start a child that uses an already registered name.
 3706: already_started_outside_supervisor(_Config) ->
 3707:     %% Avoid inter-testcase flakiness
 3708:     ensure_supervisor_is_stopped(),
 3709:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3710:     {ok, SupPid} = start_link({ok, {#{}, []}}),
 3711:     RegName = registered_name,
 3712:     Child = #{id => child,
 3713: 	      start => {?MODULE, start_registered_name, [RegName]},
 3714: 	      restart => transient,
 3715: 	      significant => false},
 3716:     %% We start another process and register the name.
 3717:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() ->
 3718:                              true = register(RegName, self()),
 3719:                              receive
 3720:                                  die -> ok
 3721:                              end
 3722:                      end),
 3723:     {error, {already_started, P}} = supervisor:start_child(SupPid, Child),
 3724:     Pid = P,
 3725:     terminate(SupPid, shutdown),
 3726:     Pid ! die,
 3727:     ok = check_exit([SupPid]),
 3728:     ok.
 3729: 
 3730: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3731: terminate(Pid, Reason) when Reason =/= supervisor ->
 3732:     terminate(dummy, Pid, dummy, Reason).
 3733: 
 3734: terminate(Sup, _, ChildId, supervisor) ->
 3735:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(Sup, ChildId);
 3736: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, kill) ->
 3737:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3738:     exit(ChildPid, kill),
 3739:     receive
 3740: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, killed} ->
 3741: 	    ok
 3742:     end;
 3743: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, shutdown) ->
 3744:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3745:     exit(ChildPid, shutdown),
 3746:     receive
 3747: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, shutdown} ->
 3748: 	    ok
 3749:     end;
 3750: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, {shutdown, Term}) ->
 3751:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3752:     exit(ChildPid, {shutdown, Term}),
 3753:     receive
 3754: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, {shutdown, Term}} ->
 3755: 	    ok
 3756:     end;
 3757: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, normal) ->
 3758:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3759:     ChildPid ! stop,
 3760:     receive
 3761: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, normal} ->
 3762: 	    ok
 3763:     end;
 3764: terminate(_, ChildPid, _,abnormal) ->
 3765:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3766:     ChildPid ! die,
 3767:     receive
 3768: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, died} ->
 3769: 	    ok
 3770:     end.
 3771: 
 3772: in_child_list([], _) ->
 3773:     true;
 3774: in_child_list([Pid | Rest], Pids) ->
 3775:     case is_in_child_list(Pid, Pids) of
 3776: 	true ->
 3777: 	    in_child_list(Rest, Pids);
 3778: 	false ->
 3779: 	    ct:fail(child_should_be_alive)
 3780:     end.
 3781: not_in_child_list([], _) ->
 3782:     true;
 3783: not_in_child_list([Pid | Rest], Pids) ->
 3784:     case is_in_child_list(Pid, Pids) of
 3785: 	true ->
 3786: 	    ct:fail(child_should_not_be_alive);
 3787: 	false ->
 3788: 	    not_in_child_list(Rest, Pids)
 3789:     end.
 3790: 
 3791: is_in_child_list(Pid, ChildPids) ->
 3792:     lists:member(Pid, ChildPids).
 3793: 
 3794: check_exit(Pids) ->
 3795:     check_exit(Pids, infinity).
 3796: 
 3797: check_exit([], _Timeout) ->
 3798:     ok;
 3799: check_exit([Pid | Pids], Timeout) ->
 3800:     receive
 3801: 	{'EXIT', Pid, _} ->
 3802: 	    check_exit(Pids, Timeout)
 3803:     after Timeout ->
 3804: 	error
 3805:     end.
 3806: 
 3807: check_exit_reason(Pid, Reason) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 3808:     receive
 3809: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
 3810: 	    ok;
 3811: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Else} ->
 3812: 	    ct:fail({bad_exit_reason, Else})
 3813:     end.
 3814: 
 3815: check_no_exit(Timeout) ->
 3816:     receive
 3817:         {'EXIT', Pid, _} = Exit when is_pid(Pid) ->
 3818:             ct:fail({unexpected_message, Exit})
 3819:     after Timeout ->
 3820:             ok
 3821:     end.
 3822: 
 3823: start_registered_name(Name) ->
 3824:     supervisor:start_link({local, Name}, ?MODULE, []).
 3825: 
 3826: ensure_supervisor_is_stopped() ->
 3827:     case whereis(sup_test) of
 3828:         undefined ->
 3829:             ok;
 3830:         Pid ->
 3831:             terminate(Pid, shutdown)
 3832:     end.
 3833: 
 3834: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 3835: %% The Logger handler used.
 3836: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 3837: log(#{meta := #{mfa := {supervisor,do_restart,3}}}, #{test_case_pid := Pid}) ->
 3838:     Pid ! ok;
 3839: log(#{level := info, msg := Msg}, #{test_case_pid := Pid}) ->
 3840:     Pid ! {fail, Msg}.
